medabots_server:advancements.bosses.aren: The arena is home to some exclusive bosses.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.argo: Argorok is a ferocious, armor-plated winged dragon from the twilight realm. Maybe it's lonely because it can't fly down to the ground... Isn't there some spot where we can latch on to it?
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.comm: When forced to battle, the Commander Shroob's primary attack is calling his Support Shroobs into the battlefield and launching them at the enemy. Some are sent twirling on the ground, while others are sent flying in the air.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.craz: The erratic Crazy Hand embodies destruction in the universe. You can see madness in the way he moves and the attacks he unleashes.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.dime: That's Dimentio. He's a weird dimensional magician who works for Count Bleck. Dimentio can flip between dimensions and can also clone himself. Hit the real one, and the double will disappear.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.gala: Greatest Warrior in the Galaxy: Galacta Knight
This legend was sealed away long ago because of his power. He defies time to challenge you!
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.gall: An enormous, transforming robot and Subspace Army warmonger. Galleom is characterized by various attack threats, including jump stomps, beefy arm bludgeonings, and even missiles fired from his back.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.hr_d: Drawn by the mechanical energy here, this ancient war machine crossed time and space through an interdimensional tunnel. Get ready for a dream battle with a king-sized warrior of steel!
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.land: Landia has lived on Halcandra since ancient times, protecting the land and guarding the world's most legendary items, but...
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.lor_: Excavated from the volcano where Landia dwells, and repaired, Magolor couldn't help but make a few upgrades before taking Lor out for a spin.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.mago: Magolor stole the Master Crown and the Lor Starcutter from their sacred resting places on Halcandra. He's a liar and a wizard... Defeat him!
The one-eyed wreath grants power but swallows the soul... It devours, stealing any sense of self... Truly, this crown rules all. Free him from this nightmare! Take his hand and save a new friend!
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.mast: This fearsome being is what Master Hand becomes when he transforms. The black mass around it, known as the swarm, mimics the shape of a beast and changes its attack pattern.
This fearsome being is what Master Hand becomes when he transforms. The black mass around it, known as the swarm, mimics the shape of blades and changes its attack pattern.
This fearsome being is what Master Hand becomes when he transforms. The black mass around it, known as the swarm, mimics the shape of a giant and changes its attack pattern.
The mysterious Master Hand is the source of creation in the universe. He appears in Final Destination when all other rivals are defeated.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.root: List of all bosses you've defeated.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.topm: The leader of the Topman tribe, which drifted through space to find its way here. It awaits with its tribe, to challenge any Medabot it deems worthy.
medabots_server:advancements.bosses.whom: Like most Whomps, he attacks by falling face-first in an attempt to crush you. A single hit is devastating!
medabots_server:advancements.developer_c: Challenge yourself to take on the server moderators' most difficult challenges
Finish the course's first three laps without turning around
medabots_server:advancements.easter_eggs: A nice day in the sun?
Is my internal clock off by 12 hours?
Did it just start playing removed music? Interesting.
Gotta find them all, easter eggs!
medabots_server:advancements.get.special: You got a new special item: %s!
medabots_server:advancements.get_all_med: Don't come near me without thinking! Both of my arms won't make allowances for you!
Horses are noble animals, you threaten us, we'll run all over you! Ready for the battle?
Flash! It's a scoop! Today's headline is mine! I'm slow but very powerful!
So you believe women are frail? I’ll make you eat those words! Prepare yourself!
I'm a giant beetle! My beam can go through 10000 Medabots!
You can run, you can hide, but you can never escape my wolf-like sensors!
I'm the captain of Select Corps. My right arm hammer is valuable. Use it with care!
A floating castle is strange. It's funny that people keep slipping. Well, let's shoot.
I feel alive in the water. I won't let you pass me in the water so easily!
It's good to be able to fight freely. Well, I've got one more time to revive.
Women are delicate? You are so out-of-date. You should learn a lesson!
No big enemies are a match for me, because I aim at their vital spots. How about you?
Hey, stop right there. My Medaparts will make you look like a beehive in no time!
Don't hide! Come out! There is no wall between us. I won't let you get away easily!
Destruction is my thing, are you running? No? Well, then meet your destiny!
You shall never get close to our captain! You'll have to go through my armor first!
Hmmm I see. Now I get it. I don't care about you anymore!
I'm more powerful than ever! Shooting attacks don't bother me! Hee hee hee!
Rush at enemies left and right while holding them with my head Medapart! I'm simply perfect.
It's moving slowly, but you'd better not touch it. Inside is in utter chaos.
I'll get your heart by my beauty. I'll break your heart in pieces. You'll blow up at the end.
I shall change by your power. I shall burn all your enemies. That's my happiness.
Swift and raging Napalm attacks! You can't avoid them so easily! Move it! Move it!
Cold, glittering and beautiful ice. Be careful not to get frozen while looking at it.
Don't anger me, or you'll pay for it. If I can't beat you, I'll blow us both up!
It won't be long before the armies of the Republic track us here. I am sending all of you to the Mustafar system in the Outer Rim.
Destroy! Destroy! Destroy! My powerful fire attacks will destroy everything.
I'm the most famous actor of all Medabots! Robattle like dancing on a stage.
Take my red-hot fire attack! If you can feel my beat, your heart will be on fire!
Don't underestimate me because of my face! I can blow you away with my nose!
Weak, weak, weak, are you really going to face me? Well, then don't defend!
Grab and pull it! Release it with good timing! I'm falling! Help! Help!
One bite makes you feel good. Your head and arms are useless, Robattle? Forget about it!
It's too late when you see the flash! I move slowly, but my attacks are super fast.
Come on! Bring it! I shall Robattle you with the spirit of the ancient lesson.
Bring it on! There is no one who can break my defense! No one!
I'm proud enough to say, I was at the World Robattle Championships! Don't ask me how!
Oops, you slipped. Now you can't defend. Oh no! Now you are confused, too?
I'll rule this world, one way or another, because I cannot fall to a pink ball this time!
Waters are my terrain, do not challenge me, or you'll see a tsunami!
You challenge me? Ha, don't make me laugh! I'll leave nothing of you behind!
Hey, wait up, will you? You are infected by a virus. Don't move for 3 seconds.
You're not going to win, not in your dreams, or your worst nightmares!
I would be dispatched by my master to visit other planets and exterminate my master's foes.
I see now that the circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
Hello, boys and girls! Did you learn how to use traps? Come and see me at Ninja Park!
I used to be a member of an assassin guild, you know? I may not have been the strongest one there, but I'll still do my best!
Lovely ladies go from a flower to another. But actually, it's not a flower. It's a trap.
Meow meow meow meow! I can move, but you can't! Keep feeling numb for a while!
Are you in trouble? Call Pinguen! Pinguen can repair your broken Medaparts!
Let's melt it! Let's melt it! Now there is nowhere to run. Are you ready to deal with it?
I'm not daydreaming. My face is naturally like this. I can't help it.
Guided by a light, I shall show you the right path. Now, don't hesitate and let's go!
Babies cry all day? Nah, not me. Instead, I'll make you cry all day!
Healing is my specialty. Twirl, twirl, twirl! And now you are fine!
I fire powerful attacks with every part I have. Ready to fire?
Ka-booom! Ka-booom! My heavy armor and fire power! You think you can defeat me?
I may be old... But I can still prove my worth... Your bot is as good as mine... So let me teach you a lesson!
I don't like Robattles, but I can't turn my back on somebody who needs help, be it a drowning puppy, or a losing Medabot!
Get each Medabot set at least once
A containing attack by Right Arm. A counter by Left Arm. Missile to finish! I'm perfect!
My job is to support others, and not everyone can do what I do. Can you Robattle with me?
I don't like violence. Preventive care is important against attacks and damage. <3
Hiding is my speciality. Now I'm behind you. Yes, I'm in the bush.
Where you run to escape is not always safe. Watch your step. That's called a booby trap.
I can do anything, even with limitations I can do the impossible. Ready for battle?!
We're hungry for some Energy Spheres. We could've sworn you run on those, give them to us!
I'm not a butterfly, I'm a Hummingbird Hawkmoth: swift like a hummingbird, hushed like a moth, deadly like a hawk!
Who says swans are the most beautiful?! Don't you think white ducks are as beautiful?
I'm only following the rules of the Robattle Championships. Nobody takes my title!
As a shark, you might think of food, all I think of is breaking you!
Huh? Intruders? No problem, the power of twilight shall destroy them.

medabots_server:dialog.infinity.blue_man: It has nothing to do with Medaparts...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.bonus_ar: Haru simply went a little too far...
So you still like the doctor, huh?
Who said anything about me and Haru...?
So she talked to you two about that...
She didn't tell you what her dream was, did she?
Medabots and Medafighters laugh and fight like siblings.
And when they encounter difficulties, they help each other.
That may be the relationship she dreamed of.
I think that's a good relationship too.
Are you saying that just to spite me?
Sorry for getting you involved in all this.
I was just talking about the ideal relationship...
So you mean I'm far from the ideal!?
It's almost as if Haru's dream is here.
You don't have to laugh so hard...
It's always been my policy to trust other people, but maybe it's time to rethink that policy.
I didn't think that her dream would be achieved this fast.
I don't think Haru would be mad if I showed you this.
It's what we said before, but these are new stages that're planned to open.
We just need someone to actually try it out, but...
We haven't been able to decide on a tester yet.
It's hard to find the right person Haru wants.
Your good nature is one of the best parts of your character.
We've been thinking about using one of the participants in the race.
If we found the right one.
If Haru herself was here, she'd pick you.
Would you accept our request to try out the stages?
To get into those stages, you need a special pass.
I gave it to your friends.
This is just because I like to have fun.
Don't you think so too, Pops?
To get the pass, you must complete the task of the person who has it.
I didn't give them anything specific, so it may be easy.
First let's go find who have the passes!
Also, I have both a present and a challenge.
Please accept this as an apology.
You mean, we gotta find that...?
This is the pass that opens that door.
If I didn't give you the challenge, Haru would've scolded me.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.brass_sa: Don't say stuff like that in front of Erika!
But that's what the doctor said, isn't it!?
She didn't know how time would affect...
I don't understand what you're trying to say.
I don't remember being the master of such a cold Medabot!
I don't remember having such a hard to understand master!
I didn't say anything that wasn't true.
Could you just TRY and be obedient a little?
I never thought of you as my master before, buddy!
You've got a lot of mouth for a Medabot!
Are you trying to discriminate against Medabots now!?
What are you screaming for, Erika...?
Erika, why didn't you tell us sooner?
You two were being stupid so you didn't notice!
You really don't know how I feel now.
I woke up because of your voices.
The fights they get into could wake the dead.
Oh, by the way Erika, since you're back, is Neutranurse back too?
I was worried about Brass, so I came here...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.brass_ta: What am I going to do...?
What if something happens to her...?
It's not like me to sit here and worry...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.death_br: Do you really think that I would lose to THAT?
I didn't think you were that weak-willed.
Just thought I'd have a little fun with you...
(Oh, a stray Medabot, eh? Well, then no one cares what happens to her...)
We're weak, so we need two to fight.
In any case, just come with all your might.
Then you knew that she was strong too...
That's why I tried to stop ya, boss...
When you know stuff like that, try harder!
A Medabot is walking around by itself...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.desperat: She's tomboyish, but also kinda cute...
So you see her like that?
I never thought I'd hear you call her cute.
Well, if we're talking cute, then it's Karin.
You only think that cause you're not.
What do you think about Brass?
You don't feel anything when you look at Max?
As far as Max goes, I feed bad for him.
Brass probably doesn't even see it.
Kind of like "Let's all be friends", ya know?
Okay... so, dependable, caring for others, and being cute...
All of them apply to me!
Why do I feel like I'm left out!?
As for the other two, I guess not.
A Medabot could never understand my beauty!
Obviously your eyes are broken too!
Hey, looks interesting, so why not go?
Even Peppercat is in love, but I can't seem to be!
I'm going to drown my sorrow by Robattling!
This is more like her anyway.
What do you think of Erika?
This is out of the blue...
Reliable or not has nothing to do with Robattling power.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.doctor_h: Why?
And yet I lost...
Master...
Ha ha ha...
It's been a while since I was called that...
You must have been released from the system.
(Sigh)
Even my confidence in the system now...
Master...
Why does it feel like Caroline is calling me?
Caroline?
It was the name of Haru's precious Medabot...
That's not possible...
Hmm...
You couldn't be!?
Director Tune...
So you've finally come to see Haru.
Yes...
What's going on?
Director Tune, what does this mean?
Over there is someone you know very well.
That's not likely.
This Medabot's medal only exists for the sake of my research.
My Medaparts are more efficient...
I wouldn't expect anyone else to know about it.
Perhaps you'd like to explain it, Jaxy...
Okay...
Did you just say Jaxy!?
Why...?
After I was separated from my master, I was picked up by the director.
He welcomed me with open arms.
He said "Until you can go back to Haru, you can stay with me".
Then Director Tune and master began ToruToru Land together.
I would often go to see what she was doing.
My medal was under the control of the Suppress System.
It was you, wasn't it?
The one who was going in and out of my lab.
But a Medabot can't change Medaparts on its own...
I asked Karin to help.
But Karin got caught over there...
First she helped me with my arms and legs.
So Karin helped you with the parts you've got equipped now...
Unfortunately, when I was sneaking in, Karin caught me.
After I told Karin the situation, she smiled at me and said "Don't give up, Jaxy" and helped switch my head Medaparts.
She must have been caught after that...
I know everything there is to know about Medabots.
Master...
Realize what you're doing...
You...
Why did you switch places with Blackbeetle?
I wanted to be together with you...
Even if you didn't realize it was me.
I just wanted...
You said you've been watching me.
So then you know about my research.
There is no reason for me to have lost...
Yes...
If you stay in the system like that, you'll be no more!
You'll lose your emotions and never be able to feel anything again!
If that is my master's wish, that is fine...
Are you crazy!?
Mr. Metabee...
Jaxy!
It's because you have your identity that you wanted to be with her, right?
If you lose your emotions, your heart, yourself...
There won't be any point to be with her!
You lack the bond between yourself and your Medabot.
Don't lie about not caring if you lose your emotions or not!
He's right, Jaxy.
I mean, Caroline.
You don't want to erase your happy memories with Haru, right?
Ha ha ha...
How stupid...
Abandoning someone and then feeling betrayed.
I was the one who betrayed you...
Master...
It's a crucial part.
You're stupid too.
To just keep thinking about me like that...
Really... stupid...
I'm sorry.
I don't expect to be forgiven for what I've said...
Master!
Where are you going?
The Suppress System is the physical representation of my twisted heart towards you.
I must bring this to an end myself.
Master!
If you can't find a reason, then that's why you lost!
Oh no!
We've gotta stop her from doing something she'll regret later!
Don't worry.
Haru isn't that stupid.
More importantly, we've gotta save that girl, and fast.
Karin!
Just accept you lost!
It can't be!
I can't accept it...
I will never accept it!
If I accept this, then what becomes of my research?
Haru...
Tune...
So, I guess it's quite laughable, isn't it?
My life's work turns out to be a waste.
I'm a failure as a researcher...
There's still many chances to redo it.
There's no way it...
It's no use.
No matter what I do, time will never come back...
Director, you know Haru from the past, right?
I know her well.
Back then she still thought Medabots were cute.
That's an old story...
Pops...
What in the world happened?
As you both know, Haru is a distinguished Medabot researcher.
But you also know she doesn't like Medabots either, right?
You said we were an exception, doctor.
Yup.
But...
Back when she first started her research, she wasn't like that.
She would always be playing with her Medabot, taking it here and there with her.
It's gotta be a joke.
Ha ha ha... it's true.
If you only knew what I am now, it might be a joke.
Haru...
It's okay, Tune.
I'll take it from here.
But when a Medafighter and Medabot combine their power, they can make the impossible possible.
It is my story after all.
When I was a child, I loved Medabots.
I would play with them, and Robattle with them.
But no matter what I did, I could never win Robattles.
Still, I would always have a fun time.
But people change...
No matter how hard I tried, or new Medaparts I used, I still couldn't win.
After a while, it began to affect my thinking.
"Why can I not win", I asked myself.
Then I realized...
Not just us, doc.
It wasn't the medals...
It wasn't the Medaparts...
I knew more about Medabots than anyone else...
Still, I couldn't win...
So, at that time...
If it's painful, I'll continue the story.
I'm fine...
When I lost again, I took it out on my Medabot.
That poor thing must have suffered so.
I looked at it, and hated it.
Anyone can do that.
Afterwards, I simply abandoned it...
How horrible...
Then it never came back home.
Of course!
What kind of Medabot would after that!?
You may be right.
But, back then...
I thought that I had been betrayed...
Why did you think like that?
Who knows...?
Blackbeetle fought exactly as I ordered.
I really loved that little guy.
I became so lonely.
I knew what I did was wrong, but... my feelings inside became twisted.
From then on, Haru could only see Medabots as something to be researched...
But it's true.
Because no matter how I thought, they wouldn't understand.
Haru...
The only thing that stayed with me after that was, "Medabots must be strong, emotions are unnecessary".
If she was strong, I would never have betrayed her.
Never left her side.
The Suppress System was working normally as well.
Thinking like that, I just kept going on.
Searching my way to make them strong...
Even still, I can't forgive you for what you did!
I don't expect you to.
It really doesn't matter to me anymore.
The research...
Medabots...
Ever since that little one disappeared, a hole in my heart opened inside...
You're bound by the system, and wouldn't understand.
It's about time you finally got here.
Oh, I didn't tell you yet.
Let's kick some bot!
I strive for a completely obedient Medabot with unmatched strength.
Simple, isn't it?
That's why you made everyone suffer!?
You betrayed Pops!
You used the Rubberobos for your ends...
All for something as stupid as that!?
I don't understand what you're saying.
Doctor!
It's true I used the Rubberobo Gang to kidnap Medabots, but it was to gather data.
I expected you to be here much quicker based on your power.
I told them to give them back afterwards.
I didn't tell them to do anything else.
That's just an excuse.
True...
What do you think the Medafighters did when their Medabots vanished?
Of course they searched around desperately!
If Metabee vanished, I wouldn't stop till I found him again!
I guess you would.
But the others are different...
Eventually they came here with new replacements.
Something wrong?
Never!
Everyone thinks of Medabots as their friends!
You don't just switch so easily.
Can you prove that?
At least my friends wouldn't do that so easily!
How about Samantha who cried over Peppercat?
Or Erika who worried so much about Brass!?
Or Koji who felt guilty because he couldn't protect Roks!?
Ha ha ha...
Birds of a feather flock together...
Such good kids.
Not just humans!
Medabots also think about their Medafighters, always!
That's the bond between both of them!
And what meaning does that have?
A Medafighter says Robattle to his Medabot.
That means "win".
If it loses, all it's rewarded with is criticism.
But if it wins, they celebrate.
T-that's true, but...
Doctor...
So the answer is easy.
"A strong Medabot is a good Medabot."
You're wrong!
Not just strength!
Win or lose, the heart is still connected.
Even a loss will someday bring strength.
Medabots and Medafighters rejoice together, but they also suffer together.
You've had your say.
But my answer is different.
No matter what, a Medabot is a robot.
What do you want?
A toy made to bring joy to humans.
A pawn to be used for fun Robattles.
If that's not true, then there would be no reason for a Medafighter to give up on a missing Medabot.
And if that's true, then I feed bad for the poor Medabots.
If Medabots even have emotions, they only feel sadness.
From a Medafighter's point of view, emotions are an interference.
That's why I began my experiments, to push out all emotions and finish a way to ultimately unleash a Medabot's true strength and power.
But I've been unable to do it well yet.
I cannot control a medal completely, but...
Please, tell me.
But thanks to you, I've learned so much...
The way to erase a memory from a medal...
Particularly via a signal used to manipulate a Medabot's medal...
Using stimulus I can force a medal's emotions to move.
There's no way to manipulate emotions.
Ha ha ha...
It turns out emotions are nothing more than electrical impulses after all.
I was able to control them, but it took time to learn how to suppress them.
Thanks to you, I could.
What is it you're actually trying to accomplish?
A very emotional Medabot like Metabee provided me with very useful data.

After analyzing the change of a Medabot's movement due to outside signals and electrical current in the Medabot itself, I eventually came to realize all I had to do was erase the signal from the medal.
I call it the Suppress System.
No way...
Well, what do you think?
That's all a Medabot's so called "emotions" are.
You're wrong!
%s and I are different!
Totally different!
Metabee.
Accomplish?
Doctor Haru.
What can I do to make you understand?
I don't know anything about your studies, but I feel something warmer inside Metabee.
I see...
If that's so, then show me how your precious little bond surpasses all my research...
By Robattling with Blackbeetle!
As you wish...
We can't lose.
There's no way we're gonna lose now!
We're fighting for Pops and everyone!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.erika_is: When are you gonna learn to go easy on girls!?
But you said not to go easy on you!
Erika must be feeling quite frustrated.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.erikas_a: I have to Robattle to write a good article.
So, I'll be waiting for you inside.
Hey, I won't forgive you if you go easy on me!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.erikas_c: Man, Pops sure can be mean sometimes.
I can see I would lose anyway.
So how can we get the pass then?
I was planning on writing a piece about ToruToru Land.
I still don't have enough pictures yet.
I've already been all over and I'm dead tired...
If you find someplace good, tell me, okay?
If it's useful to me, I'll give you the pass.
I guess I'll have to go to the stage using this pass instead?
Then you better find a good place for me.
We should go ask Max for help with this!
Erika, did Pops give you anything?
He'll be more than happy to help out!
I have seen neither Max nor Brass around.
I already asked Max, but then...
This is the real ToruToru Land!
There's someplace I want to show you...
Oh, you mean the stage pass?
What kind of place is that?
On top of that, Brass is gone now too!
I think I can get a scoop with this...
So didn't he tell you to give it to us?
I get the feeling that he did...
At last, the next "Daily Erika" is now complete.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.erikas_p: He doesn't have to be so shy though.
It would be good if they managed to work it out.
Anyone else, and I'd feel sorry for him.
I didn't expect you to be this strong...
Those two fighting over Brass would have been a good story...
Erika, what does "fighting over me" mean?
That would get Metabee in trouble.
It's no scoop, but it's perfect for the article.
Oh, if you want the pass, I have it.
Erika would have lost it, so I...
We can depend on you more than Erika.
Okay, let's go use this pass!
Even though you lost, you were so cool!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.flame_ti: She's busy with her experiments, I'd expect.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.gillgirl: Hey, it's dangerous to hang around here, kid.
I'm so happy you know who I am.
You came to use the jammy too, right!?
I can't stop my body from moving on its own.
C'mon buddy, don't leave me like this.
I was sure the setup was perfect this time.
I can't think of anything cool to say right now.
You cannot speak before my beautiful form.
It's all thanks to the anti-jammy program we got from Doctor Haru.
It would have been polite to lie anyway.
But the Select Corps. cannot tell a lie.
You better catch her before she gets away.
Treat me more gently, will you!?
The Rubberobo Gang has been captured.
So THAT'S the reason why the setup failed.
That just means you're the reason you lost.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.gut_feel: What's up with the weird face, Erika?
Anyway, I get this feeling there's more to this.
I'll go look for my own!
She thinks the Rubberobos are still up to something.
The Rubberobos got caught too easily.
Now that you mention it, they were pretty easy to stop this time.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.haru_and: Hello, Doctor Haru.
Do you get along with Pops?
Get along?
Well, we don't fight.
That's a roundabout way of saying it.
Hee hee hee.
Sorry.
It's hard to be honest when you're an adult.
So, are you a friend of his?
Back in the old days, we were in the same college.
I was always in the Physics section.
Hello, %s.
I met him at a staff party.
He had no confidence when it came to machines, but he loved Medabots.
That's how we connected.
Now, I haven't seen my Medabot in so long...
Why is that?
That's...
I-it's because I got too busy with my research and got too old...
I know someone who is pretty old, but still plays with Medabots.
Right, %s?
What are you up to?
Um, yeah...
We were talking about me and Tune, right?
Pops stopped playing with Medabots too?
No.
I stayed in touch with Medabots only for research, but Tune...
He kept playing with Medabots.
He always said: "A Medabot is a child's best friend.
Adults can give children toys, and be satisfied, but that's not enough.
There is a lot to learn only a friend can teach.
In this age, human contact has decreased a lot, but Medabots can fill the gap."
I saw you, so I thought I'd just say hi.
He likes kids a lot and used to want to be a teacher...
Wow, I had no idea.
So then why do you and Pops get along?
Since you stopped Medabots, and he didn't, how did you two relate?
Well...
He would always come visit me at my lab.
You researched Medabots, didn't you, Doctor?
Oh, that's why you two got along well.
That's not all though.
Is there something else?
I see...
I thought he was coming here for Medabots, but apparently every other researcher knew that he had a crush on me.
Whaat?
Director Tune liked you?
I was always so busy in my lab, I never even noticed.
Poor Pops...
Anyway, I heard all this after the fact.
Even though I didn't ask him directly.
Is that so?
Right after he graduated, he landed himself the job he always dreamed of...
He got to make a park for kids and Medabots.
What's the matter?
In other words, this place.
In an effort to combine knowledge and technology, I was asked to collaborate on the project.
I see.
So this is the result of all the research you did.
That has so many meanings.
Oh my...
It's already late.
I had thought to just catch a quick breather outside in the fresh air.
Guess I got too deep.
By the way, keep this a secret from Tune, okay?
I was just thinking that Tune did well.
Why can't we tell Director Tune?
You'll understand when you get older.
Here, take this.
It's a Tinpet.
This is our little secret, okay?
Okay, thanks a lot!
You're so simple.
Tee hee...
I'll be going now...
Oh, you know Director Tune?
I guess he hasn't said anything.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.harus_ex: Man... so what do you want us to do anyway?
I was hoping to do some really easy tests on a few Medabots.
I just want you to clear some points with this Medabot.
You've cleared this once, so it should be easy.
Is it okay to ask for your help with something?
We owe Doctor Haru a favor.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.harus_ti: You need to assign them according to the situation.
Can't just do anything with just a medal, right?
I feel really muddle up inside.
You look like something is on your mind...
This stage is pretty tough, so he's gotta think, ya know, he's not good at that.
I was a little stuck there...
Why don't you try using this medal?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.into_the: It took Erika and Koji's Medabots.
How can you be so calm at a time like this!?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.jammy_di: I don't think I've ever seen this before though.
I think I've seen it before.
Do you know what it is?
Nothing can get away from my piercing gaze!
You accidentally found it when you tripped over.
Anytime he tries to say my name he gets like this.
Anyway, did you figure it out?
I dunno, but it looks a lot like the guys who were running around just now.
So, you mean it's a Rubberobo?
It's like they took off their antenna and left it.
I guess it's not over with the Rubberobos yet.
Well, I'll leave it to you to handle them then.
So when they come crawling, BAM, bye-bye Rubberobo.
Well, I'm going to find the connection between the Medanappings and Rubberobos.
I'll be moving on in the race!
Can I ever count on you?
Anyway, I'll let you keep growing your skills...
I expect you to lend a hand when the Rubberobos show up again.
Don't be like "I haven't assembled my Medabot yet" when the time comes, okay?
Here, you can have this Tinpet.
Brass is taking care of things for me now, so, see you later!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.jammy_ex: If you help, I'll clear your elimination from the race.
Of course I'll help you guys out.
When Brass goes back to normal, then all jammies are gone.
We don't fully understand them yet, so leave the jammies alone after breaking them.
And Peppercat has been with me!
I'm keeping her inside my Medawatch until she cools her jets.
I've been keeping him inside my Medawatch just in case.
I wonder how other Medabots are doing...
Did anything strange happen to Brass?
Oh, you mean when I started to dance around like that?
I think I have an idea as to what's up.
To put it simply, it's a device that makes a signal and "jams" the controls of a Medabot.
It's a typical Rubberobo plot really...
I asked Doctor Haru to research it.
It turns out to be what I thought.
It's a device used to mess with the controls of a Medabot.
Doctor Haru created an anti-jammy program to nullify the effects.
Everyone take out your Medawatches so I can send you the program.
There's no sense in calling it "jammy".
It seems to have happened to every Medabot.
It depends on how sensitive they are to the jammies apparently.
What did you do to Brass?
Medabots who use Spy are extra sensitive to jammies.
Everyone should be okay thanks to the program though.
Then Brass should be fine too, right?
The program I built in my Medawatch restricts aggressive actions, but still allows jammies to affect her.
By watching Brass' reactions, we can sense if jammies are still here.
We need you to remove all the jammies.
Koji's Medabot should be careful too.
How did you know that, Metabee?
I think you just don't know since Peppercat left to chase Max.
Until the "Spy" technique wears off, he's stuck.
Before any more panic starts, destroy the jammies.
How can I with Brass the way she is?
Why do we have to get involved in all this?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.jammy_te: Um... What kind of people are Rubberobos?
They usually manage to cause a lot of trouble.
They gotta be too stupid to realize what they do sometimes.
But they are trying their hardest, aren't they?
Hey, they're still a gang of evil people.
We should wipe them out for the sake of world peace.
Hi %s, how's the race going for you?
Is it some kind of festival dance?
Help me, I can't control my body...
What can I do with this?
How come Metabee and Neutranurse suddenly had no control?
Yeah, Rubberobos keep showing up and causing trouble throughout the park.
Jaxy, do you know anything about it?
I was just thinking about something else.
I can't think of a good answer.
It's weird it happened to only me and Metabee.
Metabee, did you eat something weird today?
I didn't give anything bad to Neutranurse either.
It's not like they'll do anything major anyway.
Um, Medabots don't eat anyway, so...
It's gotta be the Rubberobos' work.
Next time I see them, they're dead roaches.
Yeah, but it could also just be you too.
It's no wonder we suspect them, and by the way, you're the one who first said they're to blame.
I'll go take Neutranurse for a rest.
Since they showed up, the number of injured people has gone up.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.jaxy_is_: She always makes Karin worry like this...
I thought she was kinda strange before...
Don't say anything that will make Karin worry.
"I'm really glad to have met you, Mr. Metabee."
In other words, she was saying bye for good?
Why didn't I notice it before?
I wonder what she's brooding about...
Jaxy exchanged Medaparts with someone recently.
She said "Please help me put these parts on".
She brought arm and leg Medaparts...
Jaxy's head is a transform Medapart.
If her head transforms, then we'll never be able to recognize her.
We've got no choice but to ask everyone.
Find anyone who knows about Jaxy.
If you know them well, you can tell the difference.
I'm going to try and figure it out too.
I knew Karin always needed me...
Does he still worry about that?
She seemed really happy after Robattling...
I never even thought of this guy as my master.
Well, a Medafighter wouldn't be called "this guy".
I can tell you guys are real friends.
We never had any fights like that before.
That's why you can fight like that.
Doesn't that just prove you are best friends?
When my master gets back, I should say "you devious mecha-maniac"...
Well, there are many ways to connect.
I expected you to be sad 'cause the doc isn't here.
You taught us about the bond between a Medabot and a Medafighter...
I get all shy when you say it like that.
It's not a big deal at all, really.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.jaxy_spe: You really have no tact at all...
Is that how you talk to your master?
Who the heck is my master?
You two are such good friends. <3
Jaxy got separated from her master, right?
We should take her to the Select Crops.
Her master might be looking for her thinking she's been Medanapped.
I know about it already, but her master is too busy for her now...
Then she can get back to her master.
Besides, I'm a little concerned about her.
It'll take at least a year before she can even Robattle.
In the past she seems to have Robattled.
Our moods at the time of a Robattle affect us too.
When we're fighting, I can't even beat Krosserdog.
Medafighter and Medabot are like one soul.
Without teamwork you're gonna lose the Robattle.
What kind of person is your master anyway?
You shouldn't speak badly of others.
But it might be her master's fault that she's like this!
It's my fault that my master...
I wouldn't feel good if somebody insulted %s, either.
Some people never win, but never give up!
You can become stronger with effort.
I'll Robattle with you anytime you want.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.jaxys_ne: Want to try out Brass' Medaparts a little?
Consider it a gift to Jaxy.
We got to check out some other places.
I feel like a different Medabot now.
They're probably very compatible with you.
She got spare Medaparts for Brass from Erika.
She said to change her feelings, change her Medaparts.
If you change how you look a little, you can change how you feel.
It's like when girls change their outfits and feel better.
Can I go for a walk?
Didn't something about her change a little?
She's not talking about just you, bud...
It can also change whether you win or lose a match.
Then how about Pretty Prime to feel brave now?
Brass really likes those Medaparts too.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.karin_sa: Jaxy told me all about it.
Still, you didn't have to just obey and get caught.
I knew in the worst case scenario that Jaxy would have helped me out at the last minute.
You knew everything, but let yourself get caught.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.karins_c: If you're looking for the right thing, I believe Robattling is the best choice.
But I think I would rather like flowers.
Let's go take a stroll over there.
When I was watching Neutranurse, they caught my eyes.
So we just grab the flowers, and we're done?
But I'm sure you'll find them, %s.
Did you get anything from the director?
It's like she really doesn't care about it, almost...
We gotta do it for Karin and the pass.
We'll find them after we take a round of stages.
Alright, please take care of it then.
Before you give that, they have to pass a challenge.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.karins_p: He just gets bashful when he's praised.
What were you gonna say in front of her?
I had to say something since you were sidetracking.
We did the task and got the pass.
For you Karin, it was nothing really...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.kojis_ch: I mean, it IS you after all, Koji.
Master may be careless, but you say too much!
Truth is, Director Tune came by and told me to give you a challenge.
If I win, gimme the pass.
Shall we compete by the stage versions?
This stage has many challenges inside.
If you clear all stages in ToruToru Land on all stages versions, then I'll give you the pass.
Did you receive anything from Director Tune?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.kojis_is: Actually, before the picture gets to her...
No, seems like they've disappeared for now.
By the way, have you seen Erika around?
Not her, but I saw Max just before.
He said they are going solo for a bit...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.kojis_mi: Yo, Koji!
More Medaparts, more power.
They don't get it.
Get what?
Those kids talking about how they want better Medaparts and more power.
They might win a little, but inevitably there is a limit based on strength.
Yeah.
And it's no fun fight with one pattern all the time.
It's better to mix things up a bit, especially if you have lots of Medaparts.
You're right.
You have to use various Medaparts to clear the stages.
Sup, %s?
So you can learn it naturally, but I recommend you try to see what new Medaparts are capable of.
You won't know if they will work until you really try them out.
Also, you might learn some things you didn't know just yet.
I gotcha.
Do you really?
If you only use your favorite Medaparts, suddenly you can't advance.
This story sounds like it's about you! Ha!
N-not me!
I'm so sorry, master.
It's all because I was careless...
I tried to clear them out in one shot using sacrifice Medaparts, but I failed.
What're you saying?
You're pretty cut and dry on what you like and don't like, eh Koji?
Careful though, you might make a mistake.
Yes, last time master made a mistake with the timing...
Okay, that's enough.
We don't have to go there.
I knew it was about you!
Your dumb honesty really rubs off on Roks.
Metabee!
You're making fun of me too!?
Dummy.
I'm actually happy to hear I'm similar to master.
It's pure luck he doesn't have your temper though.
You two are a good combo because Roks can cool your fire.
If they were both hot-blooded, we'd be in trouble.
Ah ha ha ha ha!
Ahem! Anyway...
Remember what I said, okay!?
Come on, Roks!!!
Yes, master!
Destroy is much stronger.
Sacrifice breaks after you use it once, right?
Oh, you're right.
Must be something better.
I hear you man.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.kojis_pa: That's what I expected from my rival...
Next time I see you, we'll Robattle.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.krosserd: I get a feeling it happened in a dream.
What did you do to Krosserdog?
I wonder if you understand what "hypnosis" is.
I just took control of this medal for a little while.
Then the others may have been too...
Oh yes, I did the same to all of them.
That's why I said it's best to hurry.
Once enough time passes, there's no coming back.
They may never revert back to normal.
But, in all honesty, it's still experimental.
We've gotta free them from her control quickly!
Oh no, not Mr. Tune too...
I asked the director to let me in.
I've got some business with Doctor Haru.
Not just him though, everyone else too.
We were suddenly surrounded by Medabots and...
Give me some good advice, like when the "jammy" incident happened.
How can you sit there so calm, %s!?
According to the Select Corps. the same thing might have happened to Erika!
She's the one who gave the orders to the Medabots to kidnap the others.
She's the mastermind behind all this.
But realize it's for the sake of my research.
All my research up to now have culminated into this Medabot.
Once I have the data from your Medabots, my research will be complete at last.
Hey, you actually know this guy?
I didn't order you to do that at all.
Now everyone will see that my research has created a Medabot with unbeatable strength.
Now that we'll not be having any more interruptions.
I have to find him right away.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.kuwagata: Kids and Medabots were meant to get in trouble.
Pops here really seems to know what's going on.
It's an honor to meet you here.
He's not that big of a deal, ya know.
I'm sure you'll get more use out of them than I would.
You sure it's okay to take these?
I can't wait to see the rest of the park!
How are you doing with the race?
You look like you know a lot about ToruToru Land.
Oh dear, time for me to go.
I couldn't see where I was going.
Maybe he's part of the park staff?
Then we'll see him again sometime!
My "journalist sense" sees an aura of news.
Now why would Pops have an aura of news?
ToruToru Land is mostly for kids and Medabots.
My "journalist sense" is hardly ever wrong!
Maybe you're just a poor judge of character?
Wherever I go, news isn't far behind.
I just need one story to fulfill my dream of becoming a cameraman...
If I could meet that person...
I have to become a first rate cameraman to be as good as that journalist...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.lone_slo: I'm not really that into it.
It might mess up my outfit.
It might be fun to just watch it though.
Won't you be in trouble if Samantha finds out?
Boss got angry and so she left me alone...
Are you in the race, Sloan?
Race? Oh, boss mentioned it briefly.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.max_got_: Have you been able to say Brass yet?
You don't have to say her name.
Ha ha ha, Metabee, are you worried about Brass?
So, Max, how is it going anyway?
As long as I can be with them and learn together, it's enough for me.
But someday... someday... I'll be great...
Pretty weird to see you not together with Erika.
Actually, sister recognized me and said "find your own scoop!"
That's why I'm on my own now, searching for a scoop so I can prove myself to her!
Looks like he got the brush off...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.maxs_fir: She came straight to me for an interview.
She must be a handful for you, %s.
What are you interviewing Pops for, Erika?
He's the person who built this place.
What are you all doing here?
As I though, he's no ordinary person.
He's not human and you're his sister, so... you're a Medabot!?
I just asked Erika to let me be her student.
My skills have a long way to go, but I just have as much spirit as you, sister!
Please, teach me how to be great like you!
(Now she'll stop dragging me around everywhere.)
Do you realize THEY could drag you around?
What do you mean by that!?
During the interview with Mr. Tune she ran out of film, so I went out for more.
Oh, sorry. This is my partner.
I must first become a top rate journalist...
But I hear they also have top rate private lives...
I want to be a great journalist.
I just became Erika's disciple a few minutes ago.
Sister forgets all about love before an interview.
But I'm not giving up my love life!
What the heck was that all about?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.medanapp: I overheard Director Tune and the Select Corps. discussing children who've lost their Medabots.
Most of them haven't come back, either.
Investigating turned up only normal strays.
Besides the normal ones, many are still missing.
So they're taking it pretty seriously.
Seems to be becoming a big problem.
So that's the big news you were talking about.
Seems they found some Medabots who were missing for a long time.
They spoke of a dark place where many still are.
But at least the missing Medabots were safe.
That's one way to see it.
Since so many Medabots have been taken, there must be some organization involved.
If you find any stray Medabots, report it to the Select Corps, okay?
Maybe you over-interviewed him and Pops escaped?
Have you guys heard about the Medanapping incidents?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_dir: Nothing major. Just ran into somebody.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_doc: A new medal is a lot like a newborn.
Their personalities are deeply influenced by their Medafighters.
Jaxy may have had a kind of unforgettable trauma.
I don't think this punk influenced me.
If I had, you wouldn't be so violent.
You lose your cool and start a fight!
I wonder what made Jaxy so fearful of everything.
Tee hee. She'll be better soon...
Have you seen a suspicious looking Medabot?
It has to be her previous master.
Part of this park is loaned to me for my research.
I think someone snuck in, and I saw a Medabot escaping, so...
Medafighters have a lot of influence on their Medabots.
Well, if I find it, I'll tell the Select Corps.
I wonder what kind of research she does.
Depending on how they're raised, a Medabot will be either agressive, like Metabee, or quiet, like Neutranurse.
So Neutranurse is sweet because you raised her.
That means Metabee... I don't like that theory...
A Medabot's personality mirrors its Medafighter
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_jax: It surely is freaky to see your face in front of Karin.
Aren't you two just best friends?
I asked her to run an errand for me.
She looks like she strayed from her master.
So let's tell the Select Corps. Her master is probably worried sick.
She gets along with Neutranurse pretty well.
I'm thinking I might just keep her with me.
No need to hide from me!
She's really, really timid and shy...
What kind of Medabot yells at girls, huh?
She's weird, so I said she's weird!
If you got a problem we'll Robattle over it!
You can't talk to girls like that!
You two just can't communicate, can you?
It's the first time I've seen this Medabot. Hello.
It looks like she doesn't like you, %s.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_kar: Hey, Karin.
Looks like I'm going to be in trouble now.
Why, what's wrong?
If you need help with something, ask me.
The trouble is that if I don't beat you, I can't become the champion of the race.
Does that mean I get to Robattle Neutranurse?
It will be my honor to Robattle with you.
The honor is all mine... Uh... That was weak...
Be good.
We'll see you later.
What am I going to do...?
Oh, hello. You came too?
By the way, if you don't use "swim" Medaparts, be careful with deep water.
Hello, Metabee.
Hey, how're-ya doing?
Very well, thank you.
I'm guessing since you're here, you will be in the race too?
Yup, of course.
I want all you can eat!
I mean, I wanna win!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_koj: If you're looking for Karin, I just saw her at Grassland A.
Why do you guys always have to stick so close to her like that?
Miss. Karin's parents requested we do so.
Those two were off in quite a hurry...
"The wind of fate blows me onward to danger..."
I'd forgotten the most basic journalist rule!
A big scoop won't come to you!
He's like one part Erika and one part Koji.
Not like us. We go by our own pace.
Let's have a quick warm-up match!
We are in search of Miss. Karin right now.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_max: He sounded a lot like Erika for a sec there.
I took a good shot of you two!
I'm always taking shots of Medabots.
I want a shot that gets me on the front page!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.meet_scr: Well, I'm done with you two for now!
Didn't I tell you not to call me "boss"!?
Those guys have to be up to no good.
Hey, you told ME to stop.
I need to find someone weaker than you...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.motivate: Your eyes change color when you talk about her.
So Jaxy has had a lot of troubles...
But she's doing a lot better now.
She's even getting close to Robattling.
Even I have to be careful not to slip up.
The way she beat those Rubberobos wasn't luck.
Well, if she was as timid as you, she wouldn't get stronger at all.
I want to become stronger too...
Also, you need to work on your teamwork.
That poor girl is trying so hard!
You can't as long as you're Samantha's puppet.
Why are you two so down?
I'll show you our real power!
It's about time they finally got going after all that talk.
Sometimes you are able to be nice, Metabee.
If we try hard too, we might get stronger.
Jaxy's life seems to be pretty tough too.
Still got a ways to go.
I'm confused as to who's master...
It's good to show some spirit.
The next Robattle will be good!
We can't change what happened just now, but we can change our future!
If we get stronger, even the boss might...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.neutranu: Sometimes they get so carried away.
You'd better get back to Karin, Neutranurse.
My Medaparts don't feel so good...
Would everyone please form a straight line?
I was helping out the injured, but then more and more started gathering here.
My Medaparts don't feel so good...
It's a nurse's sacred duty to help the injured.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.new_look: As usual, you go right for that.
Fight me normally, otherwise there's no point.
Well then, I've got no other choice!
How do you like your new Medaparts, Jaxy?
I'm still breaking it in, but I feel different.
Kind of like a breath of fresh air is inside me...
%s, if you cared about fashion, you would understand.
So Jaxy, wanna Robattle with me?
After a number of battles, you'll win eventually.
Your weak spirit comes out when you fight.
You need to be like you were just before.
It's not the Medaparts, it's your heart.
That's what influences your strength during a Robattle.
Robattling is something to look forward to.
I feel like I don't have anything good...
But your original setup is dangerous.
It's like when you transformed into Prominence.
So, just to make sure, %s, right?
Here you go. This is the pass for the racers.
There's a set route for the racers to follow.
First, go to the place named "Woods Battle".
Pay attention to the signs in the park.
You can also record your progress.
I see... I'll have to keep that in mind!
We still have some time left.
Now now you two. No need to go that far.
You woke me up suddenly and you're like "Let's race"!
Don't you know what's going on in ToruToru Land today?
Today is the annual Robattle race!
Don't you remember you said, this time, you'll take part and be the champion!?
The first prize for the Robattle race is...
A year-long pass to ToruToru Land!
I heard from someone that you get rare Medaparts too!
While the pass is valid, it's all you can eat and drink in the park!
It's bad enough I'm losing to Rika, but I'm losing to Brass on top of that?
Those rare Medaparts and that free pass are mine!
So, do you have tickets for the race?
Hey, what's this Rika? My name is E-R-I-K-A.
You need a ticket to register for the race.
Only you could forget something that vital!
I figured that was the case, so I got it.
Wow, Erika really thinks about us sometimes.
Actually, I was the one who lined up for it.
Something's strange... Nothing is suspicious here.
Here we go again with the star journalist bit.
Yeah, if the world were going crazy, it'd be bad.
Hee hee... You took it easy on us because we're girls, right, Metabee?
Don't underestimate the great Erika Amazake!
There's something going on in ToruToru Land...
Seems I'm not the only one investigating this place.
Registration for race participants can be done at the information booth in the center square.
Maybe it was a photo for us to buy later...
Let's get going to that info booth.
Yo! He said "hello"! At least say "hi" back!
I'm sure he didn't hear me.
Excuse me, but I'd like to enter the race, please.
Oh, you want to take part?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.opening_: You're supposed to take it easy on me!
I'm going then. See you later.
Wait! Don't we start from Grassland A?
%s, you have to follow your own course, okay?
If you get lost, look at the signs next to each entrance.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.peace_ki: If it's a Robattle you want, we'll give you one!
(They all look the same, I can't tell who's who.)
Was he even trying to Robattle?
I don't know what he's up to, but let's find him...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.pepperca: How did you find out about this place?
When Spyke went in, he figured something was up, so he staked out the place.
Afterwards, he saw Totalizer come out then told me about it.
It was pure coincidence that we ended up together.
The mastermind behind all this was Doctor Haru.
I heard that from Director Tune.
How can you all be so carefree!?
Somebody, help my poor little Peppercat!
If only Karin and Neutranurse were here!
It's the aftereffects of the doctor's medal control technique...
Even she doesn't know the full extend of the aftereffects...
I can't do anything to help her now!
Without my Medabot I can't do anything.
My Peppercat can't go back to normal?
If Max were here, we could find Neutranurse...
I'm going to go look for Max.
I think Brass is around here somewhere...
Doctor Haru said five of our friends are here.
Brass and Roks might be the last two...
Keep an eye on Samantha and Peppercat.
Give me a hand for a second!
I should go look for her.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.postgame: Okay, I'll show you what I can do.
It seems our tests didn't help.
Please Robattle with us again, okay?
That's what I want to hear.
Take it easy on me every now and then!
Oh, before I forget, Doctor Haru gave me something to give to you.
She said to have you take care of this medal.
I'm still not strong enough for you, but I won't give up!
Please Robattle with me again, okay?
Would you be my Robattle opponent?
Maybe I'll try copying Koji's style or doing some extra special training...
Alright, we'll show you how we do it!
I thought it was Ms. Pepper.
I'm not worthy of an opponent to you!
Are you picking a fight with me?
It's much better for your sake.
Stop thinking about him during the fight!
This isn't even a fraction of my real power!
I hope my clothes stay clean...
You want to come Robattle with ME, huh?
D-don't say I d-didn't warn you!
But boss, there is always next time.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.red_pepp: What was that Medabot's name again?
Hey, we need time to get ready, you know!
I'll take his place as your opponent...
I'll be waiting for you inside!
I was told to come back after Robattling.
He wasn't serious about that Robattle either?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.roks_sav: Hey, Koji is waiting for ya!
I don't think he's lost any memory.
I am so sorry my weakness made you worry, master.
It couldn't possibly be my master's fault.
A hundred apologies for my failings.
I'm not worthy to live in this world!
Koji can't possibly be happy to hear you say that!
I'm sure Koji's just happy to have you back.
We can make up for this by training together.
I'd rather smack you around and force you to apologize to everyone, but if I do it by force, then I'm no better than you.
It's been so long since I heard a line like that.
Teach her that the most important thing in Robattles is the bond between a Medabot and its Medafighter and their courage.
You'll be my opponent then, will you?
Koji's charged me with this job.
I'll be your opponent until the end!
Not to the likes of you!
Roks, I'm letting you rest for a bit.
Roks is really strong and more courageous than Metabee.
Just believe that Metabee will bring him back.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.roks_tak: Someone attacked me and took Roks.
It just took me by surprise...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.roks_vs_: The way Roks is chasing him, I can't believe it's for no reason.
Give the film of the picture you took right now!
Sorry, but a film is a journalist's life!
Oh no, don't look at it!
A great cameraman has a keen sense at all times!
I must fight for master's honor, Metabee.
If you want to hold a grudge, do it at me.
No matter what, sister has GOT to see this shot.
Run, run as fast as you can!
Roks is taking this too far.
There's no need to get so worked up over a photo.
Please look forward to the next "Daily Erika"!
I'm finished if she gets her hands on that.
On my life I will see that it does not happen.
Like Max said, just look forward to the next "Daily Erika".
I can't wait to see what she says about that.
Why should I listen to you?!
Did Max do something wrong or...?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.rubberob: If they're around everything goes crazy.
It's best to catch 'em and toss 'em out quick!
Well, I mean that you're always chasing them.
I just hate the way they scurry around.
If I help you deal with them, let's Robattle, okay?
I'll do anything as long as they're gone.
Who was that guy just now?
All dressed in black with a horn on his head.
Also, he had something really strange with him.
Let's make the next one here.
Let's bust it up so Brass stops dancing.
We got to stop the Medabots inside.
My Medabot won't come out from here.
I saw them standing next to the entrance earlier.
Are you making fun of MEEE!?
If you lose against me, you'll be wearing these black tights too!
Do you like the uniform that much?
People have no fashion sense these days.
We're the only cool ones with black tights.
Your sense isn't really the height of fashion either.
Are you making fun of me?
By the way, are you guys strong?
If they take my Medaparts, I'll have to go to Squidguts and ask for more.
But if I don't Robattle, I won't get any Medaparts.
I was supposed to take their Medaparts, but lost instead.
You need to Robattle more to beat me.
I don't have time to be depressed.
Squidguts will give me the evil eye for sure.
Do you wanna Robattle with me?
Wanna join up with the Rubberobos?
No way, we're super cool and fresh!
Okay, if you beat them in a Robattle, I'll join.
I hear that Select Corps. has great Spice-A-Roni.
So, you're not as stupid as you look...
So much for the ol' "Let's have lunch at the Select Corps." plan.
I'll give you this Tinpet, so come join the Rubberobos.
So you don't want me to join, huh?
If you beat me in a Robattle, I'll join right here!
But this is a female Tinpet.
It's not fair to lure them with stuff!
We can catch those Rubberobos anytime we want.
But we better check it out anyway.
Since I came here, my body hasn't stopped moving.
Me and my Medabot are really good at dancing.
So you're gonna lose and give your Medaparts?
OK! I'll be right inside here!
Just lose the Robattle and leave your Medaparts, okay?
If I beat you, you gotta join us.
It's easier to thump people in Robattles.
You're the one who'll get thumped though, right?
We're trying to have a vacation here!
Don't take it out on me.
Stop picking fights and then stealing Medaparts!
If we fail, Squidguts will have our heads!
Something of this caliber is a little too elaborate for the Rubberobo Gang.
All these Medabots belong to us.
Even if we leave them alone, they'll still come to us.
You might want to check on the chaos happening inside right now.
First we gotta deal with these Medabots!
They must've gotten a smarter leader.
A smart person wouldn't be part of their gang though, when you think about it...
Never mind, if you knew, you would have checked.
The other scenario is that somebody Medanapped it.
Do you know anyone who wanted your Medabot?
Well, there was a strange guy saying "Gimme those Medaparts-robo."
I'm interviewing a kid who got separated from his Medabot.
Why are they still here %s? Hmmm?
So, did you already tell the Select Corps.?
Next time you see them, make sure you catch them, okay?
They said "Leave it alone, and it'll come home wagging their cord behind them."
Do you know where your Medabot might go?
He was running away while saying "Robo-robo".
Why are you getting in our way?
Because you are getting in OUR way!
Thank you for taking my Medabot back, but... it doesn't move.
Stupid Rubberobos always causing trouble for everyone.
When we defeat them, you'll get your medal back.
If you see any Rubberobos tell the Select Corps.
I lost against such unfashionable guys.
Whew, that fight had me pretty nervous...
Tell me, why are you cheering up Rubberobos? Hmm?
That wasn't where I was going with that...
Rubberobos shouldn't be depressed about losing.
You know of the Rubberobo Gang?
Oh... I didn't know that... we're famous...
When I'm done, you'll be on break alright.
Then let's meet in front of the Select Corps.
I got this, but I don't need it.
Yeah, I got a Tinpet for free.
This is the medal we got when we beat your Medabot before.
They're really acting arrogant this time.
Did something happen to this Medabot?
And now you got a medal but it's not the one that was in your Medabot?
You know how you can modify your Medabot from anywhere here, right?
It's fine when you just change Medaparts, but when you change medals, our Medabots are defenseless.
How can we defend if we can't even move...?
Those Rubberobos from just now must have somehow switched medals!
If you activate a Medabot without realizing it, it acts based on the medal inside it...
You just let them walk away freely!?
How can you be so dumb!?
They're like roaches infesting this place.
You should stomp them whenever you see them!
So, see a Rubberobo, give him a beatdown, yes?
I have to spread the word and tell everyone to be extra careful.
Can you give me a hand?
I'll be smashing Rubberobos along the way, so we might even find your lost medal.
The truth is that there is no medal inside that Medabot.
I can put the same medal you just had back in, but it won't go back to the way it was.
I guess the dance is over.
I think I'm a pretty good at dancing.
You said you'd lose and give me your Medaparts!
As I said, you got thumped, punk.
If we were that strong, we wouldn't have to recruit new members!
We've taken care of quite a few Rubberobos...
There is still no end to them.
When I say cousin, I mean you, big cousin %s.
Sister Erika, cousin %s, and brother Metabee.
Any friends of sister are all family to me!
I'm not worthy to say her name!
I saw Rubberobos taking Medabots away...
Tomorrow's headline will read "ToruToru Land infested. Rubberobos up to their old tricks again"!
What do you expect me to do?
The entire park is in an uproar over this!
This is our chance for some good news!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.samantha: Looks like you've come at the right time.
You'll be crying to me for mercy soon enough.
There's no way I'll be saying that.
Do you guys know what this is?
As long as I have this, you have to listen to me.
Looks like the director isn't playing.
My task for you is to find me a good looking guy.
Go find me a good looking guy...
But if you want this pass, you've gotta do what I say.
I wanted to see someone who had a proper challenge.
I guess Pops made a mistake.
She's always up to no good.
No matter what "challenge" it may be, yours is too laaaaaame.
I'm sure Koji's challenge is better.
His challenge will be hard for sure.
Why do we have to search for a guy for YOU?
Hey, if you clear my challenge you get this pass you know...
She'll probably just ask for something else anyway...
But first, give us the pass.
Then we'll do one challenge of yours.
Are you sure you want to talk like that to me?
There's no reason for me to give it in advance.
If I were you, I'd take it and run.
You said if I'd bring you a cool guy, you'd give me the pass, right?
It really doesn't surprise me in the least.
And how are you cool, huh?
I said it was a joke.
Even a joke has its limits.
You don't know the painful longing I have overwhelming my heart.
I guess a Medabot really doesn't mirror its Medafighter.
You can't even fight without your Peppercat!
I'm going to tell you who I want, so listen up!
Intense eyes, short hair, red shirt, black pants.
Intense eyes, short hair, red shirt, black pants.
Hair in a ponytail, wearing a blue shirt and black skirt.
It's a girl by the way.
Okay, we'll go look for her, so while we do that, would you come see a friend of mine?
Okay, you come with me and Metabee, I leave it in your hands.
I'll look too after I bring him there.
What do you want from me?
Sorry, but you went off ahead of me and...
They're siblings and got separated from each other.
Then, while he was visiting with you we looked for her.
If you have some time, could you come with me a sec?
Well, you saved me some trouble.
Now we can go to the new stage!
Samantha, when did you become nice?
You can call me big sister from now on, okay?
But she just called you big brother...
Not only siblings call each other big brother.
I told you that you should call my name.
It's dumb to be called brother by your girlfriend.
I'm looking for someone right now.
I've been calling you big brother since we were little.
We brought the guy and helped her find him too.
Why do we have to be the ones to run?
But I didn't do anything wrong!
If we go back empty handed, no pass for us.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.seaslug_: Now you better go back and get caught by the Select Corps.
If we have a proper pass, Select Corps. won't suspect a thing.
I bet you didn't think of that, did ya!?
Does he forget that he's the evil guy?
Well, even the Select Corps. have faults...
If you do not defeat me, the great Seaslug, you won't get any further.
Try not to lose to us again, 'kay?
Well, once he's done, we're free and clear.
Didn't the Select Corps. catch you?
Just in case we got caught, we entered the race.
I kept winning and they kept letting us go temporarily!
What in the world is he thinking of now...
I guess he just thought to play around here, because things weren't going as he would have liked.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.see_doct: Have you seen a suspicious looking Medabot?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.see_sloa: My clothes will be ruined if they get wet...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.see_spyk: I was told to find someone weak looking...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.select_c: This time they're trying to talk to children.
If you see any, let us know.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.shrimpli: You start off with just one antenna, but if you do well, you can earn a second one and become a weader!
If you join us now, I'll give you a medal too.
Here is a medal for you.
Now I just need you to sign your name on the dotted wine...
We're wecwuting members for the Wubbewobos!
You may stop us here, but we're wecwuiting at other places too.
Can you stop us all by yourself?
We can't leave them like this.
Wecwuiting is limited to only kids!
They did give it to you.
I guess you can all join!
After you join, we'll run diagnostics on your Medabot and it'll get stwonger!
And you'll get your own uniform like I'm wearing wight now.
The setup was set to test mode!
All the Medabots can do is dance!
Why do you always get in my way?
It's cause you're always doing something stupid.
Wisten to what the Wubbewobos say!
Like what you do to everyone isn't?
We just want to wule the world.
And making Medabots dance rules the world how?
The setting is wong, that's all!
If the setting is changed, the program may not work.
But I can't move my body...
I don't want to do such a lame dance.
The power of the jammy is awesome.
This is precisely why I didn't set up inside.
Leader or no leader, he's still a kid.
I don't wanna be called a kid by a kid.
We should've just put it under some bench in the middle of the night.
Then these kids would have never found it.
Why would they go out of their way to make it so obvious?
I'll leave this to you two.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.sloan_go: See, it's not as hard as you think it is.
Well, this place isn't as cool as I thought.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.sloans_c: What are you doing?
Well, it's your choice.
By the way, Sloan, did Director Tune give you anything?
I got a pass for something.
Yeah! That's it.
Give us that, 'kay?
Calm down Metabee.
What does it do?
Oh, that?
It's used to get into a new stage.
If I get them all, I'm allowed to go inside.
This place looks like fun, but I don't wanna go in...
Then you can't have it.
Me and my big mouth...
If you find me a way I can play here and not get dirty...
That's just plain ridiculous...
How about giving it to me if I clear this stage without getting damaged?
That's okay too.
Alright!
What a weirdo.
If it's interesting, just go in.
But if my clothes get messed up...
You can't play if you're worried about your clothes.
And if my Medabot gets hit, it'll be scratched...
Yeah, but you can fix it easily.
Ewww, I don't wanna be dirty...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.smug_sea: Things have quieted down for now.
Did you forget about all the trouble I've caused you in the past?
Besides, just because he's the leader doesn't mean he's important.
We can't even remember his name...
You'll never forget my name again!
Prepare to meet your doom, fools!
So you've got some new plan then?
Do you want to hear it?
I already know it's going to be lame.
Alright already, I'll listen to you.
Coming out and running back like roaches.
Hah! Like I would tell you that easily!
Don't take us so lightly, kid!
I wanted to see your face when you got made fun of!
But we beat all the leaders, so things should go back to normal for a bit.
Enjoy your short lived peace until then.
I'm the leader of the Rubberobos.
If I was the leader, that's what I would do.
Ah ha! You've forgotten about me, the great Seaslug!
Until you defeat me, the Rubberobos will never perish!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.spykes_c: What's up, Spyke?
That's how a real man would think.
If that's what you think.
The staff said it too!
As long as you have good skills, clearing is easy.
There's a limit to that.
Check this out!
I cleared all these stages with just Bluesdog Medaparts!
Such zeal...
As long as you keep switching Medaparts, you'll never be this good.
You got something to say?
I can't seem to clear this stage...
We can't just be expected to just sit here and take it, %s!
Hold on, Metabee.
Well then, how about you clear it with Bluesdog Medaparts?
Wait, you may not be able to do it anyway.
That's enough out of you, Spyke!
You never know when to quit, do you?
Let's see who clears this faster, okay?
Yeah!
We cleared this place.
Is it really that hard?
You need to be able to use Prominence well.
A real man wouldn't need a Medapart like that.
What're you talking about?
Different stages require different Medaparts, right?
I can clear it using only Bluesdog Medaparts.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.spykes_i: Even if it wasn't %s, it would still be the same.
It's gotta be because we're weak, boss.
Krosserdog is smarter than you, Spyke.
Try showing her how strong you can really be.
Jaxy's success must have inspired them.
It's your fault the boss is...
Why the heck is it MY fault?
Look, you can't blame this all on %s.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.spykes_p: I can get into a new stage with this!
Are you gonna let him get away with that?
I'll be taking that pass back!
We couldn't do it, but you could...
By the way, did you get anything from Director Tune?
I cleared this, so gimme it!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.squidgut: I heard some Medabots couldn't be controlled by the jammies.
I'll be breaking that jammy thing.
That would be quite troublesome for us.
We can't overlook that part of our plan.
I can't overlook your plans either.
But your functions are weakening, so now's my chance to attack you!
If you stopped causing trouble, we wouldn't annoy you.
Well, if you say it like that...
Why are you still acting normal?
Well, I really must be going now, so...
You're under arrest for troubling ToruToru Land.
And where is the proof of that, huh?
Are you not the Rubberobo leader named Squidguts?
Looks like I've gotten a little famous.
I am the one and only.
It's regretful I end like this, before realizing my own ambition...
Your little jammy doesn't work on me!
Doctor Haru gave me a counter program!
You're pretty sharp for just a kid.
Great, now what do we do...?
Why do I have to be praised by the likes of you?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.stop_sav: Where do you think you're going?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.suspicio: Hey, %s.
Well, rather, I think I just misunderstood.
Y'know, jumped to conclusions.
What do you mean?
Are you apologizing or making excuses?
Grrr...
I said I'm sorry!
Can I continue now?
Nobody's stopping you.
After investigating further, turns out that it IS true the staff is disgruntled and Director Tune is acting weird.
However, the staff issue can be the same wherever the workplace may be.
Erika, everything okay?
Outsiders might view it as strange, but to insiders it's normal.
I only made the suspicious connection and jumped to conclusions...
See!
I told you that Pops isn't a bad guy!
Well, that remains to be seen, but for now he seems to be innocent.
In plain English?
Okay, okay...
Truth is, I actually found someone who is shadier than him.
Wha!?
Who's that!?
You're pretty passive today.
Some punk trying to pin the blame on Pops?
It's...
It's?
Doctor Haru...
Whoa now.
First the director, then Doctor Haru?
I could understand the director's motive, but why Doctor Haru?
Just call it women's intuition...
Yo yo yo.
Doc may be scary when she gets angry, but isn't she researching?
Well excuse me for not being a tomboy!
Why would she want to kidnap Medabots?
Or use the Rubberobos?
It's just a rumor, but lately she seems to be fighting a lot with Director Tune.
No matter what fight it is, it doesn't need the Rubberobos.
If it was a normal fight, yeah, but this park seems to be Doctor Haru's idea, rather than the director's.
No kidding...
The director may have said this place is for kids and Medabots to play, but Doctor Haru said that Medabots don't need to have an ego.
Hold up.
Do you mean that we should just be machines?
If taken to the extreme, that's exactly it.
I was just thinking of apologizing to you guys...
Wow, that's kind of mysterious.
Are you kidding?
This isn't mysterious, this is plain weird!
True. True.
I thought about why Doctor Haru would make this place.
Why she would seek the talents of someone clearly on the opposite ends of the spectrum.
Why she would deceive even her old friends.
I bet there was a reason for all of it.
And you know it?
I can't totally say, but it's funny why the best Medabots were gathered here.
For what?
I think she's collecting data via all these stages.
Then, using the Rubberobos, she snatches the ones she's interested in.
All for her experiments...
It would seem to be a logical plan...
But out of the snatched Medabots there's one who came back safe.
How do you explain that?
Who knows what experiments she's even doing?
You've got a point.
But, if what you say is true, we've gotta stop her.
Straight up!
Guys meaning me too?
When she told us about her past, she was really gentle and sweet.
She was even more sugary than your mom!
That's true.
We don't know for sure she's bad yet.
We'll talk to her first...
Let's go find her then!
I'm gonna go talk to everyone!
Remember how I said that Director Tune was shady?
I think I made a mistake.
Um, then there's me... something has to be up...
You're way off, Erika.
The only thing we have in common is we like Medabots.
It's not like anyone called us here or something.
I never thought to come here.
That was pretty obvious when I had to give you guys the extra tickets.
That's true.
The one invited by Erika was %s.
Exactly.
But who...
I was looking for ya!
This stays between us, okay?
Okay.
I think that Director Tune is kinda suspicious.
Why would Pops be the culprit!?
We didn't say anyone is a culprit yet.
They just say he's shady.
Who would say that?
Calm down, Metabee.
Erika, you probably have something to back this up?
You got it.
Erika?
I didn't suspect Tune at all at first, but...
Whaddaya mean "but"!?
Spit it out already!
He's got a bad reputation.
Say what now!?
I asked Doctor Haru if I could interview a couple of people.
Nothing seemed out of the ordinary.
They were just spreading rumors about Pops!
Well, that's possible.
Like he's a cheapskate...
You were looking for me?
But you'll hear that no matter where you go.
That's why I didn't even pay any mind to it.
But with a place as big as ToruToru Land, wouldn't you expect people to be paid more?
I s'pose...
What if the director was keeping it all?
Pops wouldn't do that!
I said calm down.
All that would prove is he's cheap.
We might accidentally get Director Tune in trouble.
Now you're talking!
Did something happen?
Every now and then you say something smart, %s...
But it's not JUST that...
I've heard that he's been acting strange lately too...
He suddenly vanishes in ToruToru Land.
Not letting anyone else inside his room.
Acting grim when he's all by himself...
They say he's a little different than before.
It's gotta be because of this incident.
Besides, Tune made ToruToru Land.
Don't you think that it's funny how we all ended up here?
After this place was completed, Medabots started to vanish.
Don't even tell me not to suspect there is some connection...
That's a bunch of made-up garbage!
Okay, Metabee, then how can the Rubberobos hide?
No matter how big this place is, there are limits.
Where do they go?
Shaddup!
