I said you were wrong and Pops is not a bad guy!
That's what I mean!
Nobody else seems to be suspicious.
What do you mean?
That's cause you're a moron!
What's your problem!?
I was just saying...
Metabee.
That's enough already...
You shaddup too!
Well, there's you and Koji.
You're both famous in the Medabot world.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.teach_sl: Whatcha doing?
Now that's new.
Totalizer is talking on his own for a change.
Every now and then I'd like to try swimming...
Well, you ARE a turtle type.
What are you going to do?
Totalizer even wants to.
What's wrong with trying out Swim Medaparts sometimes?
But I don't even know how Swim Medaparts work...
Ah ha!
Swim Medaparts are really good for this stage...
Talk about your lame excuses, man!
Hey, %s!
Let's show 'em how it's done!
Good idea.
Yepper.
But I hate using Swim Medaparts...
You may not always like it, but you need to use the Medaparts that suit each stage best...
It can't be helped, since Totalizer is originally Tank Medaparts.
There are Medaparts you like, and Medaparts you don't, ya know?
But I wanna play here...
Man oh man...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.the_fina: She's still attached to the Suppress System.
Didn't you say she was released from the system?
Up till now her feelings were controlled.
Using her strong emotions, she temporarily freed herself from the system.
So if the output is increased...
She could still lose all her emotions!
The Suppress System has two modes.
You'll rue the day you ever made fun of us!
One suppresses the emotions, the other amplifies one emotion...
She won't stop until she destroys everything.
I dunno what's happening, but this is getting interesting!
Look what happens when you take me so lightly!
Now the Suppress System is in my hands!
The doctor said to stop Jaxy, so I dove after her...
You guys really risk your lives too much!
You still haven't regained your strength.
Unlike you, I'm built Metabee tough.
Little things like that can't hurt me.
When I'm better, you'll be rust on my arm...
I don't know what'll happen, but MAXIMUM OUTPUT!
If you do that, Caroline will be...
So you are the last one, Koji!
We can't lose this match for MASTER's sake!
I'm not gonna take it easy on you!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.the_pict: My "Journalist Sense" tells me danger is imminent.
Think what'll happen if you use your Medaforce here...
Koji, all this over a stupid picture?
Why don't you just give the picture to Koji?
Even if I'm asked by my cousin, a photo is a journalist's treasure.
I can't just give it up.
Would you rather be hunted down by Roks again?
I'm sure Erika would never do anything that might hurt somebody.
I was only thinking of myself and not the results of my actions to others.
But it pains me to know it will never be used for a scoop.
Roks, stop him before he reaches Erika!
Well, off to the next possible scoop!
I can't really understand all the fuss over one silly little picture.
Oh yeah, speaking of which, you saw it, right?
Koji mistook a Rubberobo for a real roach and jumped into Roks' arms like a little girl.
Well, that really would be embarrassing.
For the honor of my master...
The atmosphere has gotten really tense...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.the_prom: Boss, isn't that the one who was with Metabee just before?
The best beam Medapart combined with penetration effects from Arcbeetle.
If I run into that, I'm finished!
How did her head become Prominence?
My head just went blank, and before I knew...
Um, my friend is a nurse.
Why don't you come see her?
Turns out I was the one who needed help.
I think they're trying to find somebody weaker than them to pick on.
Looks like Jaxy is their next target.
It looks so weak, nervous and timid.
How can you be so relaxed?
Even if it IS Spyke, we can't just leave her like that.
If it gets bad, I'll step in and help.
She needs to Robattle every now and then.
Why don't you Robattle with us?
It's not that big a deal if you lose.
Heh, Krosserdog, this should be easy for you.
If we always worried about losing, we'd be dead.
Even when master was with me, I lost...
Why am I proud of picking a fight with a weakling?
Let's have some fun picking on the weak.
From now on, no matter how cheap I must be, I will become stronger!
For the honor of the Screws!
Boss, we really shouldn't force her to fight with us...
I don't think it's really picking on the weak.
Well, it's much better than them fighting, right?
We always try our best, but it never works for us.
Yeah, you're right, we're pretty weak too...
Flirting with his girlfriend in public!
Let's see how their courage handles during the moment of truth.
Let's stop being glum and just do our best!
I haven't seen such a weak Medabot in years!
This is gonna be a ton of fun.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.the_unde: You kids don't appear to understand my logic, so a display is needed.
You're going to have to fight your friends too!
Five of your friends will be your opponents.
I'm sure you'll have seen these Medabots before.
Then finally you will face Blackbeetle.
Haru, have you mixed up their friends in this as well...?
Personally, I don't care either way.
That's why I've made an exception and brought you here.
What kind of experiment is worth that!?
Who knows what'll happen to your friends.
I must call the Select Corps.
No reason to worry here, Pops.
Mr. Tune, please don't allow anyone to enter here.
I guess we can come out.
Did you say I'm the first Medafighter here?
The incompetent leaders of the incompetent Rubberobo Gang?
But how dare you include us as well!?
Actually, I think she hit the nail on the head.
I don't care about the others, but nobody calls ME incompetent!
My beauty is more than enough to prove me competent.
Don't put me in the same category as this rotten kid!
This isn't the time nor place for infighting.
Do you want something from me?
If you want revenge on them, then don't let me stop you.
There's no way a Medabot would come here on its own!
The reason why we have come is not for revenge against the brat!
We've come to punish you for tricking us!
Well, that does leave me in a spot then.
Even if I fight you, the data would be junk.
Talk about the pot calling the kettle...
Not knowing your own fault is truly a trait of the incompetent.
Arguing isn't going to change anything...
This is not the time for us to be standing around arguing.
What foolishness will you show me next?
So that's what you're up to, eh?
We're taking this one with us!
All your efforts put into that Medabot will benefit us!
You don't look so smart now, do you, Ms. Know It All!?
You may be smart, but we know how to handle things the smarter way.
You're gonna regret ever messing with us!
I suppose I need some opposition for my data.
Shall we return to our story?
Now, I've prepared the stages for you, so get going.
If you manage to beat your five friends, then you may face my Blackbeetle.
I'm sure I'll get a ton of good data.
We've got no other choice but to do what she says.
Welcome to ToruToru Land's Underground Arena!
What's so fun about separating Medabots from their Medafighters?
I thought that I had returned them all.
A ton of them haven't come back at all!
And the ones who've returned have foggy memories...
I don't mind that their memories are foggy, but I planned to return them all.
Whaddya mean it's okay that their memories are foggy?
I erase their memories before I release them.
That's why they usually don't remember being taken.
Nobody can learn of this place's existence yet.
It's as if Medabots can dream for a moment here.
The park was in an uproar, so I decided to patrol for a bit.
Then I saw everyone else walk into the Research Lab.
I hesitated a little, but then followed.
How do you feel now, after seeing this place?
You're the first one as a Medafighter to enter this place.
You must feel betrayed by your old friend...
That's not the way you should say it.
What were you trying to keep a secret from me?
So why did you ignore it?
I didn't know what you were doing yet.
Now you must feel quite the fool, eh?
I can't believe I let it get this far.
I didn't think it would come to this...
You don't have to apologize, Pops!
I don't know if I should ask, but can you save her?
Haru is still lost in the memories of the past.
She thinks a Medabot's strength is everything and kindness is not necessary.
I created this place to gather data from the Medabots who I force to fight.
But you two can prove that concept wrong to her.
You can prove that one's power may be limited, but the bond between Medabot and Medafighter is stronger than anything in the world.
You're still such a foolish idealist.
Based on the data I have been gathering, I've come to the conclusion that Medabots don't need emotions.
No matter what rule, an exception exists.
But not here in this underground arena.
Blackbeetle is the culmination of my work!
I take Medabots that catch my fancy and bring them here.
With Blackbeetle's victory, my experiment will prove correct.
As the director of ToruToru Land, you will be a witness to my success.
I won't cooperate with you, doctor.
I won't take part in your test, nor do I want to!
I thought you would say that, so I made sure to prepare some motivation.
Then I take all data I want from them.
I don't know why, but she was snooping around my lab.
So I caught her, figuring it's the best way to make you obey me.
You'll do anything for your research, won't you?
But the fun doesn't end here.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.three_co: But you know the name at least.
Your story about beating the Rubberobos is famous.
For some reason I have to ask you to Robattle with me!
Did you hear we're actually famous?
They're just trying to get out of it.
We've still got work to do...
Why do I have to fight you?
If he wants to fight, we're finished...
I can only fight if my master is present.
It's your fault they got away!
Just who are you guys anyway?
I don't know what yer up to, but count me in!
You just saw what they were doing before...
We can't let you join no matter what.
We need to keep up our mysteriousness.
You're too famous to be part of us...
Why don't you use him as a tester?
No matter what, you will face us.
She said... it's so pitiful how we always lose.
But we gotta ask them why did...
I'm sure they just wanted to try out their new Medaparts.
(But what was the test about then?)
We were told to win no matter what.
Well, that may be true, but if you just pick fights, you'll get hurt.
Be quiet, we're all gonna attack together this time!
Jaxy, just get 'em like you did last time.
Okay everyone, I'll be your opponent.
I didn't expect to get involved a third time...
Wouldn't it be better to just stop now?
This is the second time we lost like this.
It's not funny if I'm the one beaten up...
We can't show our face to the boss like this.
Who the heck are you guys?
I think the jig is up.
I'm going back to Karin now.
So that's why you guys knew about us and why I heard those familiar speech patterns.
Now that we have new Medaparts we won't lose.
Um, yeah, what are you talking about...?
As you guessed, Red Pepper IS my little Peppercat!
Boss, you don't really need to brag...
Let's just run away like we always do...
Why must I, Samantha, run away?
If we don't keep the secret...
I just want you to listen to my request.
I think it's something only you all can do.
So, doctor, you can see our true power then.
Will you stop picking fights with everybody!?
In any case, I need someone pretty aggressive to gather data for me.
Other kids are too gentle and think about their adversary's feelings.
Anyway, what is it that you want us to use these things for?
The more data you have, the better, right?
But that's what I was told to do...
I had %s helping me out before, and he did quite well.
%s can't hold a candle to me!
Oh, by the way, this is a secret experiment.
I'm depending on you to keep this secret.
Leave everything in our hands, doc!
The stage is set and the players have taken their place...
Okay boys, let's blow this place!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.totalize: Things are really heating up now.
You're much angrier than I could have ever anticipated.
You seem to be exceeding your own power limits when you're angry for others.
How much more interesting can it get?
I didn't damage the medal or the Medaparts, so he should be fine.
There's no problem now, is there?
I'll be going to the next one then.
Words can't describe how bad she is.
We can't bring him back to Sloan like this...
We made it just in time.
Doctor, what is the meaning of this!?
Our Robattle was a lot of fun...
I was surrounded by many Medabots, then...
I was told to wait here by the doctor.
Why is everyone in such panic?
Then why didn't you move after the Robattle?
Now that I remember, you never speak...
Sloan is probably worried sick about you.
I would've expected a full recovery by this time.
So there are Medabots that it doesn't work on.
But we don't know who it is or who it's not.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.tunes_or: Me? Oh, nothing, I must have wandered over here while daydreaming.
Karin, please take care of things.
Would you mind keeping an eye on her for a while?
Oh, hey Karin and Director Tune.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.tunes_ti: A Medafighter should raise different kinds of medals.
Even if you have a medal, you need something to put Medaparts on.
You look like something is on your mind...
This stage is pretty tough, so he's gotta think, ya know, he's not good at that.
I was a little stuck there...
Why don't you try using this medal?
The medal hasn't been destroyed, nor was it killed by the shock.
But there may be aftereffects from the Suppress System.
She finally got to be with her master...
You guys look like you're going to a funeral or something!
Shall I flip that Medabot's switch again?
Don't do anything more to Caroline...
So if I flip this switch, the violence begins again.
Looks like the switch got pulled anyway.
You don't have to be strong!
It's okay if you don't win!
I-I was scared at first, but I like it now.
I don't care who gets sucked in now...
He's turning the switch on again!
What the heck is this door?
It was locked by a computer, so opening it up was a real pain.
What are you all doing here?
Not only was the door huge, but it was also controlled by a PC.
Took me a while to kill the security.
You were able to hack this computer?
When it comes to hacking, boss is the best!
This boy shut down the main computer of the Suppress System.
Boss, it's like you're a hero or something...
There must have been a reason, right?
I can't read the reactions from the medal.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_gillg: Mistress Gillgirl, as ordered, the medals!
I'm in a good mood now, so if you go home right now, I might even let you live.
Big talk from a Medabot following a brat!
A little brat like you couldn't handle such power.
Besides, they match my outfit great.
Medals are not toys, and they're not your accessories either!
It's a shame I have to dirty my beautiful hands.
But I suppose I can honor you and let you fight the blossoming flower of the Rubberobo Gang.
You have to admit, she is attractive when she's arrogant...
Now is not the time to be impressed, Metabee!
Squidguts always uses force, but that's not my style.
I'll use my brains and beauty to get medals a better way.
We'll be taking all those medals back now.
You can't catch a beautiful butterfly that easily.
I'll be back to get the medals another time.
Those are the ones you stole from everyone!
That's my brand new shiny medal!
It's worth at least three months pay!
Women hate hotheaded people like you!
Yeah, not only do they look like roaches, but they have as much sense too.
You're the one who saved me from being locked in myself.
%s helped too, you know, not just me.
Karin, Krosserdog, and even Pops helped out too I'm sure.
Is that what you were sitting here spacing about?
Why are you laughing out of the blue?
You said the same thing when we first met.
I guess Mr. Metabee would think I'm kind of weird.
I didn't mean it like that.
My mouth gets me in trouble.
I want to be like you, Mr. Metabee.
Strong and bright, and your master...
That's why I ask that you Robattle me!
I swear, that's all you ever think about.
Karin will worry if she finds out you're here.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_jaxy_: I'm really glad to have met you, Mr. Metabee.
She's quite different than the first time we met.
Yeah, but she sounded a bit weird...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_karin: Hey, Robattle and your relationship with Karin have nothing to do with one another.
Karin, what are you doing here?
I'm looking for someone to Robattle with.
I can do it with you, if you want.
I'll go first and wait for you then.
Seems the race is over and done with.
I believe I'll take a bit of rest.
Koji really likes to play with Rubberobos.
I'd think he actually hates them, but...
I don't think they're gone that easily.
That's all you can ever think about.
I guess you're a much better opponent than Rubberobos.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_koji_: He's gone... At least we got to Robattle first.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_max.1: But it doesn't seem like you were worried.
Hey, what should I be worried about?
I like you... I like you...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_max.2: I let you off the hook before because Brass didn't seem to mind.
You went too far this time.
I would punish you, but this is fitting for you.
I'd rather be punished by you, brother!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_max.3: Don't do that in front of Brass...
That's 'cause he doesn't know how strong you are.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_max.4: Peppercat really likes Max, doesn't she?
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_max.6: Well, we met Peppercat along the way, and after that we got here, it's been like that.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_saman: You're not supposed to win the Robattle.
Who the heck can say that?
Anyway, don't think I've given up just yet.
Where is this sudden surge of confidence from?
I should have been the first to fight you.
Don't even think about running away now!
Well, this is gonna be your last!
It's your fault the Screws broke up.
Weren't YOU the one who walked out on THEM?
That's because you guys wiped them out.
They were already over before they came here.
It was worth it to follow you two around.
You won't be making fun of anyone again.
You talk so big, let's see how you do against me!
Think you can win against Peppercat?
Line up and let me take your picture, okay?
Don't move or you'll ruin it.
I could fall head over heels in love with such beauty.
Don't get so cocky just because you won once!
If you move around, I can't get it focused!
I fell in love with myou.
You shouldn't act like this in public...
"The notorious Screws are defeated in battle!"
Things are getting more and more complex.
At least they're out of our hair for a while.
Wherever they are will be noisy though...
This will make the front page for sure!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_screw: We just wanna stay with you, boss.
It's so boring being by ourselves...
We won't ever shame you again!
Playing by ourselves is so boring...
Let me be part of the Screws again, boss!
It's more fun as the Screws anyway...
Well, so much for our little peace and quiet.
Hey, even I think you're better as a group.
Of course you know what that means, %s...
%s, I hold no grudge against you, but I'll be your opponent!
When I say I'll do something, I won't stop till it's done!
Oh, do you want to turn tail and run?
Run if you're gonna run, but that counts as a win for us.
You bet your life it is!
I, Samantha, will give you the beating of your life!
Of course, Samantha would join too.
Well, if it isn't Spyke and Sloan.
I've decided to let you off easy THIS time.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_seasl: If you lose, though, you're outta here!
This isn't like we're playing, ya know?
Even though we came here to play.
If you say that, it's all over.
But since you guys came out to cause trouble, you ruined it!
I'm pleased at seeing your troubled and disdainful face.
I shall tell you our goal.
"To cause mischief using Medabots and then rule the world."
We're not just causing mischief, you know?
And the reason why we've selected ToruToru Land is...
Well, you didn't have to wait for us.
I should listen to him, in case he might be planning something terrible...
They're the last ones who should plan anything...
"Steal a lot of Medabots from kids, because it's easier than winning Robattles!"
That is what our strategy is...
So you're taking Medabots from kids who come here, yes?
You should be grateful that I, Seaslug, have chosen to face you!
Do we really have to deal with these stupid guys?
Can't we just get the Select Corps. for this?
The jig may be up, but you can't escape the effects of jammies!
Jammies jam the signals of the medal, so unless you have a Medabot research genius with you, you can't get away.
In other words, you can't have a counter plan set up to fight me.
You will see how powerless you are!
Is the jammy really that powerful?
Effects differ, but it works on most Medabots!
You can't even get close to jammies.
Hah, I just installed one right there!
Then there's no point to jammies!
Oooh, you'll pay for this, kid!
Yeah, or you could just get arrested!
I-I don't have to fight you guys.
Well, guess there's no reason to be here then.
That's the end of the Rubberobos.
I really think I will see him again...
Who gave you that horrible problem?
Finally, we can just concentrate on winning the race!
Okay, you can leave or get arrested.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_shrim: We have other stuff to argue about, so stop playing around, Metabee.
But we can take our time since we caught them, right?
While you've been wasting time with me, we continue to wecruit.
I'd hurry up if I were you.
That's pretty wude to compare us to stuff like that.
Why don't you do something else?
I may have miscounted the number of them...
Even the Select Corps. can do something right.
The ones who wiped us out are...?
Koji is pretty devoted to getting rid of you.
All of us lost in Robattles for the entrance test!
Stop looking at me like that!
Look who's calling who a kid here.
I got no choice but to defeat you or I can't go back.
You go report this to headquarters!
Then we could just leave, since we didn't do anything?
Well, could just take off, but at least Robattle.
You shouldn't make fun of me, or you'll be in big twouble!
It doesn't matter who's a kid or not here!
Next time, gimme a better match, okay?
Don't think I'm easy because I'm a kid.
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_sloan: And try not to end up like Spyke here...
Why do I always have to fight with you?
You're the ones who picked a fight with us!
Maybe I'll go find a good looking boyfriend.
I think it's more like your fault for being weak.
Sloan and Samantha already left, you know.
Oh, the door is closed, so we can't get in.
It's not like we're going around bragging about it.
They made fun of me, boss!
Don't cry when your clothes are messed up.
Don't act like you don't know.
Do you think that you can beat the Screws just by beating Spyke!?
Just because I lost doesn't mean the Screws have!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_spyke: I see you didn't run, though.
I'll beat you like a drum!
You had a chance to get Medaparts from %s!
I just demanded he hand over his Medabot is all!
It's his own fault for not complying!
You know, Samantha, that is what's called mugging.
Stop bothering me with silly details!
You look weak, and that's a nice Medabot you've got there.
(Sniff sniff) That was a brand new Medabot...
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.vs_squid: They're so selfish and constantly noisy.
That's why I stopped fighting them.
You should just get outta here kid.
Hey, I'm telling YOU to leave here, bud!
You better behave, or I might have to teach you a lesson in manners.
You're always getting in the way of our plans.
Give those stolen Medaparts back and get outta here!
You were the last person I wanted to run into.
You can make fun, but the Rubberobos live on after my defeat!
You won't find the Medabots we took anyway, cause we hid them...
As long as we have the stolen Medabots, it's okay to lose Robattles.
The Medabots that we hid are g-g-gone!
I thought the Select Corps. would guard them closely if we turned them in...
Well, you see... They put up a poster that said "Stray Medabots here", with a picture of the ones we took.
The kids who lost them saw the pictures and took them back!
Not only do they interfere with out plans, but they're actually useless...
How did you get them to guard for you?
Well, since they're not hidden anymore...
I'll tell you my Ultimate Secret Master Plan.
First, steal Medabots from kids, then give them to the Select Corps. to watch over.
We bring them Medabots saying "We found some strays".
Then they watch them without suspecting a thing.
No respect, they're supposed to let their elders win.
After some time passes, we go back an say "This Medabot is mine" and take them all back.
They say "The best place to hide a forest is in a tree".
But those morons in the Select Corps. ruined it.
What did you expect with such a reckless plan?
If the Select Corps. were smarter, it'd be different!
Um, Squidguts... Truth is, we lost all our Medabots too!
We left them in the care of the Select Corps. with the others.
After their campaign was over, the leftovers were sent directly to their headquarters.
At least we got the medals.
This is all because you guys do such dumb stuff!
Well, to the old drawing board!
I get the feeling we don't need to worry.
Our slogan is "To use Medabots for mischief and then rule the world"!
medabots_server:dialog.infinity.where_is: That's not the only reason you're riled up.
I just hope she hasn't gotten herself into any trouble.
I think you're the one who makes the situation worse than it is.
You know, a mountain into a molehill.
Even though you are his friend, I cannot allow you to say such things to master!
Actually, half of what they said is true...
But only because my master says so...
Besides, I think you don't have to worry too much about Karin.
Every now and then she might want to go for a walk by herself, you know.
I've always been there to watch over her.
Maybe you just want to be with her...
You guys are always together, right?
No wonder she wants to have some separate time.
You mean she doesn't want to be with me anymore?
I never thought of her as a nuisance.
I just get lonely if she's not there.
Well, I didn't say she was a nuisance...
What if she got lost on purpose?
Then that would be why I haven't found her yet.
He'll be chasing Rubberobos again soon enough.
So many people cause master trouble, so he loses her in the blink of an eye.
Maybe it's just because he's careless.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.0.2: Now I, the official Robattle referee, Mr. Referee, will be your referee.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.1.1: My life is all about Robattle.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.1.2: Sometimes I want to Robattle too!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.2.1: The heaven knows, sphere knows, everyone knows.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.2.2: I am the official Robattle referee, Mr. Referee!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.2.3: I shall be the referee of your Robattle.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.3.1: Look at the sky the stars and the universe!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.3.2: There's no better Robattle referee in this whole universe than I, Mr. Referee!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.3.3: Enjoy your Robattle from the bottom of your heart.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.4.3: And as long as I, Mr. Referee, live, I will not let you cheat!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.5.2: The hit man real engineer of Robattle, the official referee of Robattle, I, Mr. Referee!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.6.1: Congratulations on your enthusiasm for Robattle.
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.6.2: I, Mr. Referee, am here to make your dreams come true!
medabots_server:dialog.mr_referee.7.1: By special invitation from the creator of ToruToru Land, I, Mr. Referee, will be your referee!
medabots_server:dialog.other.custom_stag: I was told you might arrive here.
In case you didn't know, you can design your own stage versions in a lot of stages.
The option is on the far bottom in the stage selection menu.
Once you create a custom stage, you can submit it here, so everyone can play it when they wish.
Make sure you thoroughly test a stage before you submit it.
It just so happens that I really like fighting in unusual stages like these...
And I think working with you will let me do that more often.
Do you mind if I help you every once in a while?
Great! I do have an appointment with one of my friends now...
But remember that you can call me to your side anytime!
Alright, but I need to know your name for that.
I really have to go now, bye!
The person that just won that match!
I've been watching the battles here for a while now...
And the way you fight has really stood out to me so far.
You just seem to be very good at handling the obstacles the Lagdou Ruins has.
Most people I've seen give up at around the point when their medabot gets a virus from one of the walls...
Or even when it gets dark inside the stage.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.1: Wooow, that move you just pulled off was amazing!
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.10: Then you can finally let me experience what it's like to fly?
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.11: Why do you want to try flying so badly, anyway?
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.12: Because... An old friend of mine would always fly into battle.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.13: It didn't just look awesome, she always said how great it felt to fly, too.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.14: I had been meaning to ask her to teach me how to fly, but I haven't seen her in a while...
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.15: In that case, let me help you.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.16: The next time you see her, you can show off how much you've already learned.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.18: Just call me anytime, and I'll be happy to help you!
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.2: I wish I could do something like that...
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.3: Attacking an opponent from the air is something I'd love to try sometime.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.4: Or well, flying in general, actually.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.5: But I don't have any fly Medaparts...
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.6: Actually, I fitted fly Medaparts to the Medabot I'm currently using.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.7: This Medabot doesn't naturally come with fly Medaparts either.
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_nino.9: In that case, could you please let me help you in a battle sometime?
medabots_server:dialog.other.get_suzumeg: Wow, you're willing to lay down your life in order to ensure victory?
That was very brave... or lucky...
Regardless, I can relate, I myself had many moments where I'd have done the same.
Let me give you a hand for the next battle!
I think I hear Altair call for me.
medabots_server:dialog.other.magolor_app: Bravo Salesman, you've truly earned your reputation as a hero.
I could have HIM defeat Landia for me!
A stroke of genius, I know...
He even helped me repair my Starcutter, I really did appreciate that by the way.
Anyway, WHUHAHAHAHAHAHA, the time has come for your planet....
NO, the time has come for the ENTIRE UNIVERSE to bow down to me!
And for being such a big help in all of this, your planet gets to go first!
Prepare to bow, Terra, welcome your new overlord!
Your help defeating Landia was invaluable.
Ahh... at long last it's mine!
The source of limitless power, the Master crown!
Obtaining this crown has been my ultimate goal all along!
What's with all the weird looks?
I fought Landia myself and lost, so I fled to Terra.
That's when the thought struck me...
medabots_server:dialog.other.rock_e_ulti: So this is where we're supposed to use that suspicious pass...
He designed the general layout of the stage, I just added my own flavour to it.
Anyway, I'll leave you to it for now.
Don't forget to look for secrets!
Secrets? Alright, let's go!
I wonder what this stage version will be like.
I have a bad feeling about this one.
This stage is already complicated enough!
Let's just hope we can beat this one quickly.
I'm afraid that 'quick' is not how I'd describe this stage version.
Huh? Who are you?
I'm the one that designed this stage.
You don't look like Tune though.
Is it finally over? I thought this would never end...
Anything I would've given you as a reward was already in the stage.
Aren't you pleased with what you got?
Well...
Anyway, there was actually a third part to my experiment.
I was testing the capabilities of the last bot you faced.
It's an experimental Medabot that Doctor Aki helped me design.
That's why that was a practice battle, so we could make further adjustments afterwards.
And it's not just that one, me and the rest of our team have been working on other unusual Medabots recently.
Speaking of which, I've never seen that Medabot before...
Yeah, it's design seemed different than any other Medabot I've seen so far...
That really hurt... I swear the reward's not worth it!
You'll understand once you start looking beyond what you can see.
Speaking of, I have an appointment there. See ya.
Where?
Yeah, why was the last Robattle only a practice battle anyway?
Well, that would be because this stage version was an experiment of some sort.
What, from Doctor Haru again?
Not exactly, I was hoping to find out how a powerful Medafighter and Medabot would cope with a stage like this.
Not knowing how much of it is left, a seemingly endless gauntlet of hardships with nothing else to do but move forward.
On top of that, the experiment was also for observing just how... observant Medafighters and their Medabots are in the middle of a stage.
So are we gettin' anything special for helping you?
medabots_server:dialog.other.rock_f_dhra: Yeey! I won again!
We had to run several laps through the stage to get close, but there's a time limit.
Hey, %s, Metabee, care to give it a go?
Well, that does sound like cheating.
Because it's not really supposed to be a Robattle, it's a race.
A race?
Yes, a race.
My Medaparts are quite easily broken, so I'm naturally at a disadvantage in a Robattle.
Ok, so, if we win, what do we get?
Hmmm... good question.
Let me think...
That's not fair!
Koji, you accepted a challenge without having discussed terms beforehand?
I got it.
So, in case you didn't know, there's these big monsters out there in the universe.
What kind of monsters?
Scary, big and powerful beings of all shapes and sizes.
I heard a dragon roar in a dark palace before, but never got to see it.
A dragon as in firebreathing, flying lizard, dragon?
I'm not fully sure, as I never saw it.
This cannot be true, they're a fairytale.
You ran from the Robattle!
That's what I thought, until I got this.
I have no idea how the other Medabot in that palace got it, but I did get some valuable information regarding the beast.
If you manage to victoriously come out of this stage, I shall give you the information that that Medabot gave me.
I don't know, I still have my doubts if what you told us is true.
%s, look at it this way:
If it is true, we get valuable information regarding it.
If it isn't true, so what? Nothing bad will happen if we take the challenge.
He's got a point.
Ok, fine.
Yeey!
I got to agree with Master here, this Robattle was messed up.
I shall wait for you inside.
When you enter, you have 15 minutes to catch me.
Don't waste your time.
Oh, one last thing:
Medabots that use tank legs have no chance catching me, and you might have trouble navigating with fly or float.
Oh don't be such a baby.
Is frustration finally getting to you, Koji?
Metabee? Oh. No, it's not!
Sounds like it is.
This Robattle wasn't fair at all, he started on the other end of the stage and hid away!
I... I lost!
Basically, they become confused as to where you are.
They'll no longer be able to rely on their sight, and will listen instead!
So if you use that and are quiet, they have no idea where you are!
You said bosses, how many are there?
I'm not sure...
One... Two... Th-- wait......... yeah, three... I know of three of them.
There's three?
Most definitely more. I just know of three.
Can you tell us about them?
Well, there's the monster of the palace, a rogue machine in a massive factory and that thing the salesman fears.
Way to go!
A machine is a boss?
This one is.
It's not an ordinary machine, nor a Medabot, it's an artificial intelligence that's trying to cleanse the factory of everything.
And how about the last one?
I thought the salesman was fearless.
Not sure what it is, but he tried to sell me something, and he was sweating, out of breath, and I could see his heartbeat in his nose.
His nose? He must've been very stressed out.
What was he trying to sell?
Some crown, and despite the fear, he asked for quite a high price.
Wait, he offered it to us before as well.
Now, let's hear that so called valuable information about the monster of the palace.
Yeah, you're right!
We should help him out!
I wonder what the boss he fears is...
Sorry, but I can hear me being called back by Doctor Aki.
See you later!
I doubt he'll lower his price.
Hey business is business, no matter in how much danger you are.
What? If he's trying to survive, he'd get rid of it. It all sounds like a hoax to me.
Maybe, but I've seen that crown before... there's something up with it, I could feel it in my gut.
Ooh, I like that title.
Hmmm... I'd be on my guard then.
Good luck if the boss ends up showing up when you're there.
Oh please, I bet he's just afraid of being egg bombed by the Screws.
Hahahah!
Alright, we should go, Master. Doctor Aki is expecting us in about 20 minutes.
Right. Goodbye.
Bye.
Ok, so, if you managed to open all doors, you actually could find a Medapart.
I was told that that Medapart type is very useful against, what that Medabot called, bosses.
Bosses?
Yeah, that's what they said.
So, why is it useful against them?
medabots_server:dialog.other.ruins_in_b_: Let's go get the Select Corps.
You just said we block the exit, so you're already caught.
(Oh no, I can see where this is going... )
Better turn this place upside down!
Don't have to tell me twice!
They're just Rubberobos, since when is that a challenge?
Since they sounded like they would create a really hard to finish location...
Didn't we clear all versions here?
(Hmm, perhaps I should only follow them when I'm ready for the dev stage...)
Wait, I thought you left ToruToru Land.
Let's make a run for it!
As suspected, they messed around in here, sir.
You designed that stage version, didn't you.
I did. Congratulations on clearing it.
This is only one of the challenges my team and I put up.
Let's see if you can clear them all.
I'm not quite sure who you are...
I thought Tune designed this place.
You're Rubberobos still, you're easy to catch.
He designed ToruToru Land, I made sure everything works as it should.
I also run the surrounding area.
You're the major and tested this place?
Anyway, I have other things to do.
Well done, and keep up the good work, %s and Metabee.
I think it's weirder that he knew our names.
Oh, I think I saw him before somewhere...
That stage version really took a toll on me!
Thanks for leaving the exit wide open, idiots!
Rubberobos are still in ToruToru Land!
medabots_server:dialog.other.ruins_out_e: Weren't you with Erika when everybody met?
Um... I don't think he was there.
Hold on, I'm going to send you the program.
How long have you been here?
I entered and almost immediately started dancing.
I thought we destroyed all jammies.
To protect the world from devastation!
To unite all peoples within our nation!
To denounce the evils of truth and love!
To extend our reach to the stars above!
The Rubberobo Gang blasting off at the speed of light!
Surrender now or prepare to fight!
Is that a new slogan, or what?
I guess that's the only thing you did successfully then...
Don't mess with the Rubberobo Gang, kid!
You just told them our plan!
I've been stuck here for an hour.
Please let me handle this, cousin.
Wait, you didn't get the anti-jammy program?
I'm not going to jail again!
He really is like a mix between Erika and Koji.
Even chases them the same way.
I'm too beautiful to go to jail!
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_ch: I think I know who they are.
I'm not sure where they are though.
The last place you saw them may be a good start.
I'll see what I can do.
A group of Medabots apparently robbed a customer of mine.
The customer had borrowed something and can now no longer give it back.
You know how to Robattle, I was hoping you'd teach those three Medabots a lesson.
My customer gave a further description, here goes.
One was silent, one was uncertain and had doubts, and the last one seems to be unable to speak without saying "m".
I'm going to bring this back now.
Here's the item the Screws' Medabots stole.
Did you beat all of them?
You should call your customer to notify them everything is resolved.
Now let's resolve our matter, here you go.
Let's get out of these Medaparts before the boss arrives.
We will n-not yield to you!
You robbed someone earlier; I'm here to get back what you stole!
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_de: Alright, so here's the deal!
Heh... I have had my fair share of trouble with the Rubberobo Gang before, so I want them gone as well.
Now, he said that if I saw you, I needed to send you to the place where Doctor Haru revealed her true colors.
Wh- what?
He said that you, and only you, would know where that is.
Hmm...
Help them help me and I'll help you to this medal.
I'll help them help you help me.
(Thinking)
Alright!
The Select Corps. approached me today, asking if I had seen you.
Wait... is this a quest from you, or from the Select Corps.?
Mainly the Select Corps., but I have some gain in it too.
Where was I...
Ah, yes!
They asked if I had seen you, as they wanted to talk to you about the Rubberobo Gang.
Apparently the criminal world is talking about them planning something big, and they want your help in stopping them.
Oh, NOW they admit they need help!
You got to hurry!
(Huge gasp) (Huge gasp)
You guys got all that?
Loud and clear! We're on our way!
Good work, %s!
I going now, but you'll hear from us!
(Huge sigh)
(Huge gasp)
They're about to attack the Medabots Corporation!
(Huge gasp)
They got people on the inside that'll distract the security!
(Huge gasp)
While Shrimplips and some others steal data and overload the production lines!
(Huge gasp)
The attack signal is a napalm strike at the server room!
Pretty sure that's them giving the Rubberobos' signal to lure out the imposters within the building.
You... you got them not only the when and where... but also their signal!?
Yeah.
I'm sore all over now, though...
You're a hero!
They're the ones fighting them.
Yes, but you got them everything they needed and more to pull this off.
I shall hereby bestow upon you, the medal of honor!
... I'll throw in some Espresso as well, you could really use it.
Thank you!
Oh my, you look exhausted.
(Sigh)
All hail the Rubberobo vanquisher!
You've done so much for me and my shop...
I will never be able to truly repay you.
I'll recommend you to my overseas friends though!
And here, I'll even go and lower my prieces, just for you!
The "Friends and Family" discount, the "Loyal Customer" discount, and the "I-Need-To-Repay-These-People" discount are all yours!
Th-Thank you so much!!
Anytime, my friend!
Either that, or extremely disappointed.
Exhausted...
I ran all the way from the harbor to the Select Corps...
Was that an explosion?
Were you too late?
The Select Corps. had a headstart from me, and a smaller distance to run...
OH MY GOSH!
Oh good. I was getting a bit anxious there.
(Phew...)
Alright, let's go to Ricco Harbor.
The leader told me that's were we're meeting.
Am I not getting an outfit?
You will, but I don't have a spare one with me, and we don't have time to stop by headquarters.
Oh, ok.
Let's go!
(I hope whichever leader that is won't notice me...)
You managed to defeat this overpowered Medabot!?
(Overpowered? This was the weakest of them all...)
Yes, I did! It was a tough fight, but I got them!
I'm thrilled to annouce you to the rest of the Rubberobo Gang as our newest member!
Whoohoo!
Wait, you're not with the Select Corps., are you?
(Uh oh...)
Those losers? Nah! I won't even call for them if I got attacked by a hundred Medabots at once.
Wetweat! Wetweat!
Initiate the plan now!
It's our last chance!
I should hurry to the Select Corps. before they attack the Medabot Corporation.
I did it!
Hmm... This setup was rather weak.
Let's go one further.
That setup is a lot better to test your strength!
Oh, ok.
To Lagdou Ruins 2 we go.
To Lagdou Ruins 3 we go.
To Lagdou Ruins 4 we go.
To Lagdou Ruins 5 we go.
(Sigh)
I should get going...
Um... Would it be too much to ask...
Hm?
If I could join your group?
Hmm...
We're not looking for recruits right now...
... BUT, seeing as you're a big fan, I think the leaders wouldn't mind.
Awesome!
There's just one thing.
You'll need to prove your worth to the Rubberobo Gang.
If you can impress me, I'll let you join!
Oh wow, can it be?
Alright! I'll show you how strong I can be! Let's Robattle for the membership!
Erm- that may be an issue.
How so?
I need to be ready for something, so I cannot accept Robattles at this time.
But if you can defeat the Medabot waiting for one of our victims in this stage, you can color me impressed.
Just enter Lagdou Ruins 1, and the Medabot will be waiting for you.
I'll show you how strong I am!
You're part of the famous Rubberobo Gang!?
I'm such a fan!
Huh? Really? We're famous!?
Well, yes!
I didn't know that!
It's a pleasure to meet a fan of our work!
Definitely!
Hey, %s. Over here.
I spotted a new member of the Rubberobo Gang at the Lagdou Ruins earlier, he won't know who you are.
So, if you approach him, asking to join the gang, he might let you in.
Why can't any of you do this? You rarely take your gear off.
I don't know how, but they managed to gain information on the individual members of the Select Corps., and have posters from us at their headquarters.
When I approached this new recruit without my gear, he immediately ran, clearly knowing I was from the Select Corps.
So for once the Rubberobo Gang is being smart about things...
Seems so...
Please be quick about this, we don't know how little time we have left.
I'll be waiting here for you to return and provide updates.
This is kinda scary!
You wanted to talk to me?
I've never done this kind of thing before.
It never gets any easier.
Try to relax before approaching the Rubberobo at the Lagdou Ruins, if you're shaking, he might be suspicious.
I'll do my best!
Yes, I do.
Good to see the salesman was right in thinking you'd be there today.
Why did you not just say "come to the underground arena"?
Because I need you, and your friends know this place too, but did not know that this is where Haru revealed her true colors.
Anyway... The Rubberobo Gang seems to be planning something big, and we do not have enough information to know what it is, or where they'll strike.
I want you to go undercover in the Rubberobo Gang and find out as much as you can.
And how would I do that?
I haven't gotten in yet...
Hurry up and get to it!
The Rubberobo is at the Lagdou Ruins.
I got in, he told me the leader is at Ricco Harbor.
That's not enough, kid.
You need to go deeper!
The entrance to Ricco Harbor is at the docks.
He's here!
A napalm attack launched to the sewvers' room.
Won't that destroy the servers?
No, it won't, the glass is weinfo--
WAIT!!
Where did you come from?
That's the new member I talked about.
You idiot!
That's the bwat that always gets in the way of our plans!
Wh-what!?
Y-you lied to me!
Do I look like I care about that?
Actually, I didn't. I think the Select Corps. are pretty bad at their jobs.
But I will be reporting this in!
We can't allow that!
Get him!
W-wait!
Let me go!
We'll cwush his spirit!
You can't force me!
You can't make me!
I won't yield!
What was I saying...?
Wight! We have people who're weady to strike at the Medabot Corporation from the inside, waiting for out awwival.
When we give the signal, they'll be locking out as many people from the building, allowing us to take as much as we can.
After that, we'll overload the production lines so a fire starts, destroying any wemaining secuwity measures.
I'll focus on the data of the latest Medabot, you guys will keep the secuwity busy.
Are we all weady?
What was the signal again?
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_gh: Alright, so here's the deal!
I found a solution to that, you see, they're both Medabots!
If we can find the stolen goods, the Select Corps. can take them away!
Alright, any clue as to which Medabot did it?
My suspicions go to the Dragonbeetle with Ninja Dagger and Strike-Hit equipped.
They were looking at the items which had been burgled the moment the camera got shut down.
Alright, I'm on it!
I was away from my shop for a bathroom break.
Only to come back to my shop, seeing my inventory was all over the place.
I quickly checked the whole inventory and it seems that I had been burgled.
That's terrible!
Good news though, I have a secret camera with two suspects on the recording, just before it shut off.
It's a start!
But how are we sure which of the two burgled you? And what about arresting them?
This is the one.
The Dragonbeetle?
You know where this Dragonbeetle is?
Yeah, at Iceberg B.
Alright, I'll take them both to the station.
Next time, leave the police work to us though.
Yeah, right, like you ever get anything done...
Alright, you're coming with me!
(Sigh) He put you up to this, didn't he?
He got you on camera, right before the burglary and you have the stolen goods.
It's over.
A camera?
Ok, I must admit, I did not see that.
Wait, if you didn't see it, who shut it down?
It had to be my friend.
They arrested-
I heard, so it was both Dragonbeetle and Fly-Falcon, huh?
Yeah, Fly-Falcon didn't even know about the camera, Dragonbeetle was the one who shut it down.
So I wasn't wrong after all, good to know.
Here you go, as promised.
Pleasure doing business with you!
Likewise!
Hmm, they didn't seem to have the stolen goods.
I should get back to the salesman to ask what the other Medabot looked like.
I found the Dragonbeetle.
The other Medabot was a Fly-Falcon with Environment and Ninja Sword equipped.
That must be our burglar then.
I'm on it!
Already!?
And, did he get arrested?
Actually...
He got away?
No, they didn't have the stolen goods, it must've been the other Medabot.
Arg! I was so sure of it!
Ok, let me check really quickly...
Right, I remember.
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_kn: I ordered some supplies for my shop a while ago.
They were supposed to arrive yesterday, but they never arrived.
Do you have any idea where the shipment went wrong?
I don't even know if they were ever shipped or not.
I suspect my cargo got lost at the docks.
It is certainly not a lot...
This is the cargo you lost, isn't it?
It appears it fell behind some other containers and remained out of sight for the workers.
I believe I promised you something, here you go.
I think this is the salesman's lost cargo.
I should bring it back to him.
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_me: Alright, so here's the deal!
Sadly no, but I know their name.
How?
He was stupid enough to say "That's how Seaslug of the Rubberobo Gang deals with problems, whuhahahaha"...
Excuse me for the attempt at his laugh.
It's fine. I know him.
I figured, since you dealt with Rubberobos before, right?
Please find my metal detector. That's all I want.
I was working on the beach, looking to clean it up a bit.
Yeah, yeah, I don't strike you as the happy volunteer, I know.
So, I was using the metal detector to find any metallic items.
Let me guess, Medaparts, Medallars and Medals?
Not going to lie, yes, but also to keep the beach clean.
Anyway, I was at the pier when I abruptly got pushed in the water.
I heard a guy laugh and my metal detector was gone.
Got a look at him?
BOOO!!!!
Right here.
Huh?
I buried it in this stage when nobody was looking.
I had a good laugh with the Medabots confused by the noise.
Anyway, seems you don't need me anymore.
Bye!
H-hey wait up!
(Sigh) Guess I have to go through the stage and find the metal detector.
I wonder how I can get to the metal detector though, if it's buried in the stage...
Maybe I can blow the sand off of it with a burst of wind?
Wha!!!
Gwa ha ha ha!
Took you long enough, I was getting tired.
Hand it over Seaslug!
Well that's the problem, I don't have it anymore.
Liar!
Come on, you really think such a big object would not be visible on me?
Where is it?
And? Found Seaslug?
You can't hide it, man.
Yeah...
Yeah, and he ran... pretty fast too...
So you couldn't retrieve the metal detector?
I managed to catch up, but he had buried it in the meantime.
It took a thorough search of the area to find it.
Ah yes! You found it!
A trade! My metal detector for your medal!
Sounds good to me!
Oh how I missed you my dear, sweet, money making devi-- Er- I mean, beach cleaning device.
Arg, you again!
Bye!
Catch me if you can! Gwa ha ha ha!
Give it back Seaslug!
Give what back?
The thing you took!
Hey, I have been crime free all afternoon.
Tell that to the salesman!
The salesman? Who's that?
Oh, the guy at the beach!
Wait... didn't I...
That beeping was annoying but helpful.
Let's bring the metal detector back.
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_mo: This doctor recently came towards to, asking for some high-tech equipment.
I didn't have it in stock at the time, but ordered the supplies.
She told me to contact her when I got the supplies, but I seem to have lost the contact details.
Was it doctor Haru by any chance?
If you could find her, it'd be appreciated.
You didn't give her the medal, did you?
No, the deal was with you, not with her.
I was sent by the salesman to tell you the supplies arrived.
Well, you see, I have a different problem now.
This stage is malfunctioning, but I cannot figure out why.
If you could check it out, I could go to the salesman in the meantime.
So you just want to me run through this stage?
Yes, I was planning to do that myself, but since you're here, we could get both tasks done at the same time.
And, how did the test go?
Guess I should return to him then.
I didn't change anything, yet the stage acted differently...
Not exactly, but it's not uncommon.
Anyway, I got what I ordered now, thank you.
Did the salesman perhaps also tell you to give me a medal?
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_sp: Alright, so here's the deal!
Did they tell you where they were?
They said there were a lot of rocks...
OH, now I get it, a ROCK and a hard place, hahahah!
Erm- just... rocks, the Medabot also had swim-Medaparts equipped when they returned.
I'll see if I can find it!
This Medabot recently came towards me, asking to borrow a camera.
I, of course, borrowed them a small camera for a reasonable price.
I think I know where this is going.
Of course you do. The camera is missing.
It turns out that the Medabot got stuck between a rock and a hard place.
They function ceased, but before they got teleported out of the area, the camera broke off.
They came to me and explained the situation.
I hope you can resolve it for us.
Here's the camera!
Yes... But! A deal is a deal!
Here you go.
Alright, thanks!
(I'll just let that kid with the Medabot pay for a new one.)
Hmm...
What?
It's incredibly damaged...
Yeah, there's a big crack in it and it was laying in the water.
But it's your camera, see?
Yes, that's my sticker.
Just disappointed I won't be able to lend it out again.
Really?
Camera, check.
Small, check.
Sticker indicating it belongs to the salesman, check.
Alright, I found it!
Now let's return it, so the salesman can get this matter resolved!
medabots_server:dialog.other.salesman_un: Alright, so here's the deal!
What does it look like?
A small brick, it has some encryption on it, which is the real interest.
Do you remember how far in the ruins you were?
No, and I'm not allowed to go back and check due to the recent crumbling of some of it.
I hope I can find it.
I recently spotted this mysterious artifact in the Lagdou Ruins, but because I'm not a Medabot, I'm not allowed to get close.
And you want me to retrieve it with my Medabot.
Correct.
Are you allowed to just go get some artifact from the Lagdou Ruins?
I asked the Select Corps. They checked it for me.
I was granted permission to go get it, but only that one and only for research purposes.
The rest is too fragile and could make parts of the ruins collapse.
Sounds serious.
No luck on finding an expert?
Actually, the man in the library researches the language regularly.
He'll be at the entrance of ToruToru Land when his shift ends.
Alright, I'll meet him there.
I guess you already did more than I initially asked of you, so I should probably give you this.
I'll go to ToruToru Land in an hour then.
(I shouldn't leave my shop unguarded though...)
Um, excuse me.
Please, come with me.
Actually, I still have a lot of work to do here.
Tell him, I'll be at the entrance to ToruToru Land when my shift ends.
Alright, I'll tell him.
Yes, can I help you?
I was wondering if you know of someone who researches ancient languages.
Ancient languages?
Yes.
The salesman found an artifact in the Lagdou Ruins, but can't make up what the encryption says.
Perhaps I can be of assistance?
I regularly research the ancient civilizations of our world.
Really? That's great!
This appears to be it.
A small brick with some encryption on it.
I have no idea what language that is though...
Here's the artifact.
Ah, yes, that's the one.
Hmm...
I can't understand what it says.
I can read it, but I don't know what it means...
Perhaps you can find an expert in the field? Someone who does their research.
I'll try.
medabots_server:dialog.random_select_cor: Where the Select Corps. is, the Rubberobos will be!
Where the Rubberobos are, the Select Corps. will be!
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.10: To use a Medapart, simply press %s and it'll activate.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.12: Alright, let's move on to blocking attacks.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.13: The Medapart you select will be the one taking the damage and we want to keep our attacks functional.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.14: The enemy will attack, block it with your legs.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.15: Alright, there's one more things to cover: the Medaforce.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.16: Selecting the medal will charge up your Medaforce, but be careful, you will start to overheat.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.17: If you overheat enough, your head Medapart will start taking damage, so charge it only a bit at a time.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.18: Go and attack the enemy, you won't be able to use your Medaparts.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.19: And that concludes the tutorial, for further information there's books in your inventory.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.2: Before you can begin, we'll run you through this tutorial to cover the basics of this server.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.3: Let's get started with the health.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.4: The action bar shows 4 health values: your legs, left arm, right arm and head.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.5: If one of them reaches 0, that Medapart breaks and can no longer be used.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.6: If the head breaks, you are defeated.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.7: If you fall in deep water, you will short-circuit if you do not have swim Medaparts.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.8: In shallow water, you are fine; go ahead, cross the water.
medabots_server:dialog.tutorial.9: Next up, we're going to talk about the Medaparts.
medabots_server:entity.mission.run_until: Run Until The Time Is Up Mission
medabots_server:item.book.mt_battle_broc:
Mt. Battle is the true final frontier for any fighter!

Floating along the trenches, lava rivers and skyline of the same-named volcano, Mt. Battle offers a true sight to take in during the competition.

Be careful not to fall, though, or you won't be coming back up any time soon.

Only the bravest, strongest and fiecest of the planet are invited to participate in the feat of strength.

Once you are, you can choose to fight every single opponent classified as part of a "wave", or face a player at every platform.
The final platform is at the mouth of the volcano, along with a huge stadium for all the viewers to cheer on the fighters.

A special fighter will be waiting here for each "wave" option; don't keep it waiting.
For those who manage to clear the brutal challenge, a special prize awaits.

Will you face the "wave" and obtain a special Medabot, or will you face players and obtain a special Tinpet instead?

We'll be waiting for YOU to face the challenge! But until then, let's enjoy the show others provide!
Ciao!!!
medabots_server:item.book.stage_entrance:
Some stage entrances are not as obviously located as others.
While ToruToru Land contains a great many, there are stages who prefer not to be found.
This book will list some of these stages' entrance locations for those who need to find them.

Below the shopping market is a set of 10 stages.
The docks is home to a stage along with a fly course, the stage entrance is inside a container.
The lighthouse has a secret entrance at the top.
The container at the utilities informatics center has one.

The bathrooms at the tall office building contains one. FINAL DESTINATION 4
There's reports of an opening to another realm in the bank's vault. The only way in is the vents.
Below the beach is a portal, swim into the pier to find it. EGG ENGINES, DREADNAUGHT GALAXY
MUSTAFAR, PALACE OF TWILIGHT, SHROOB CASTLE
This slot will be replaced with bullets from Medaparts

medabots_server:item.important_book.page: This server is not related to Mojang or the creators of Medabots in any way!
This server is running the vanilla server.jar, so when you report issues, you might want to look at %s to see if it's a vanilla issue.
The moderators are serious here, get caught hacking, then it's game over, no excuses!
A Medabot is a Robot that runs on a medal, which is their mind and soul.
They can be customized to their master's liking via the interchangeable arms, head and legs.
Lastly Medabots mimic their master's personality.
There are a number of interesting links for you to visit:
Project Rising Beetle, bring Medabots back to the west!

medabots_server:item.medawatch.tracker.c: Create entries here revolving around issues.
Create entries here revolving around issues, new features or alike.
Assigning entries to players other than you is limited to moderators.
Abusively using this category may result in blacklisting from reporting.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.author: By Dhranios
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.1.2: Don't use any mods, they will result in a ban. Allowed mods are:
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.1.3: You may ask for a mod to get on the list, but it will be checked.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.2.1: Don't swear, advertise, spam, ask for OP stuff, send full caps messages, or anything else that goes around here.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.3.1: If you find a building bug, like being able to get on top of the walls in levels, please submit a bug report.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.4.1: Try not to edit your hotbar aside from swapping parts, Medapart detection is slot dependent.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.4.2: Don't rename Medaparts, the only thing that can come from that is breakage. If you did, rename it back, or message us, we'll fix it, but you'll get a (medallar) fine.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.5.1: Respect other players, don't target players who are alone if you are in a group.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.5.2: Challenge others before attacking for the most fun on both sides.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.6.1: Let the staff be who they are, if you win a robbattle from them, you won't get anything, and they won't take anything if they win.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.6.2: They only take challenges and challenge the ones who are ready for the battle.
medabots_server:item.rules_book.page.7.1: Please, report ANYONE who break these rules.

medabots_server:message.abyss_greater.in: I'll send you straight to Valhalla!
You're standing in front of the abyss!
medabots_server:message.abyss_greater.ki: I may be gone fast, but so are you!
medabots_server:message.acehorn.intro.1: You have no effect on me!
medabots_server:message.acehorn.intro.2: I got free rein, do you?
medabots_server:message.acehorn.intro.3: Do I need to panic? PANIC!
medabots_server:message.acehorn.kill.2: That's going to leave a scar.
medabots_server:message.aimflash.intro.1: Hold on! Getting the camera ready.
medabots_server:message.aimflash.intro.3: Don't move, I want this shot to be beautiful!
medabots_server:message.amelia.intro.2: I don't think I can do this!
medabots_server:message.amelia.intro.3: I must keep fighting for my family!
medabots_server:message.amelia.kill.2: YES! I did it! I got one!
medabots_server:message.amelia.kill.3: I will keep fighting for my family!

medabots_server:message.arcbeetle.kill.2: You cannot defeat the power of the sun!
medabots_server:message.ashton.intro.2: You don't realize it, but you're surrounded.

medabots_server:message.help.accelerator: If you step on an accelerator you'll get super-speed. It's easy to lose balance so be wary of enemy attacks.
medabots_server:message.help.action_floo: From an action floor stones might come rolling. Guards might come too. If you place something over the action floor, the next thing can't come out of it. When something comes out, nothing else will come out until it vanishes.
medabots_server:message.help.alarm: If this alarm is set off, Medabots around the area will come towards it too see what's up. Guards, on the other hand, will not be able to function due to the noise. If you get surrounded you'll be helpless, so watch out.
medabots_server:message.help.algae: Even with swim Medaparts, you won't be able to move through algae.
medabots_server:message.help.balloon_bom: If you shoot a balloon bomb, it burts and the bomb will fall. No matter how good you aim, you cannot destroy the bomb. The balloon bomb kind of floats, right? If the wind blows, it follows the wind's flow. You can drop a bomb exactly where you want.
medabots_server:message.help.bomb: Bombs will detonate after a specific time. The explosion covers multiple blocks. If the bomb falls in water before it explodes, it just vanishes.
medabots_server:message.help.cannon: There are many types of cannons. The detecting type, and the specific time shot type. Watch is closely, and figure out which type it is. Just handle it with a cool head. Cannons are very hard, so they take a number of hits to break. It's better to just ignore them and get on with it.
medabots_server:message.help.door: It looks like the door opens, if you push the floor switch. Usually a floor switch is near a door, so search it out. If you find a closed door, don't forget to look around.
medabots_server:message.help.drawbridge_: If you push it here, the Drawbridge won't lower. Make sure you're on the opposite side to cross over. If you use this skillfully, you can guard against attacks.

Push the drawbridge here. It will let you cross over to the other side. Just because the drawbridge lowers, doesn't mean it stays. Wait too long and it reverts to normal. You won't be able to come back, so be careful when advancing.
medabots_server:message.help.fan: You can increase the power of the wind with a fan. If you use strike Medaparts, you can change the power of the wind from the fan. You can change it depending on the situation.
medabots_server:message.help.final_robat: Robattles have a time limit. If neither Medabot stops functioning, the referee decides. If you win at the arena, you'll get a Medapart.
medabots_server:message.help.floor_switc: If you step on a floor switch, nearby devices will activate. That's not always good. Traps will activate too, so keep a sharp eye out.
medabots_server:message.help.gas_floor: Stay away from the gas floors! Gas shoots up and causes negative status effects on you. Time eventually heals most status effects. Make sure it doesn't happen while you're fighting an enemy.
medabots_server:message.help.glass: You can't break glass, but it's transparent, so only lasers pass through. If you're good, you can attack just from your side.
medabots_server:message.help.goal_area: This is the goal. If you make it here, you've cleared the stage. If you forgot something, you can go back.
medabots_server:message.help.guard: That guard there will attack any Medabot it sees. Guards can only attack using melee attacks. So shooting them from a distance is very effective.
medabots_server:message.help.hammer_punc: That's a hammer punch. It hits things in front of it. Whatever is struck by it will fly until it hits something. In theory, you can get hit from the goal area all the way back to the starting area. Hammer punches can fly you very far away, but the damage you get is not too bad. By using them, you can go to a place where you can't normally go.
medabots_server:message.help.hole: If you fall into a hole, you get damaged. Things that fall into a hole also get damaged. If you drop something important, you're in trouble. You can also throw away something useless.
medabots_server:message.help.ice_block: Ice blocks are like round stones, but only continue moving when on ice. They can also be melted by melt Medaparts. If an ice blocks falls into water, it becomes thin ice. Freeze Medaparts work the same way, it melts after a while. Ice blocks are transparent, so lasers pass through them.
medabots_server:message.help.jammy: This is the "Jammy"? It really does resemble a Rubberobo horn. Let's just break it for the time being.
medabots_server:message.help.laser_trap: A laser trap shoots out a laser in front. It fires only straight, just like laser Medaparts. It will pass through glass and ice blocks as well. Mirrors will reflect it, be careful with those.
medabots_server:message.help.medallar: When you defeat a Medabot or break a device, sometimes you get Medallars. There are a set number of them hidden in the stage. The more Medallars you collect, the more Medaparts you can buy in shops. So look for them everywhere. You have to get to the Medallar to collect it. So if you find one you cannot reach, forget it.
medabots_server:message.help.mirror: Mirrors can reflect lasers. Every time you hit a mirror with strike Medaparts, you can change its direction.
medabots_server:message.help.mission: This area contains a mission. There are several types of missions. Defeat the enemy, defeat all guards, destroy all cannons, open the exit door, and run until time's up. When you defeat the enemy Medabot, the time will stop. If the mission was run until time's up, it'll change to defeat all guards and cannons. Make sure to prepare for missions first.
medabots_server:message.help.pot: If you break a pot, you might find something. Something rare might be in it. So make sure you break it when you find it.
medabots_server:message.help.press_wall: Oh! Watch out for that press wall! If it pushes against you, you'll be a meda-pancake, no matter how tough your armor might be.
medabots_server:message.help.raft: You can travel with the current on a raft. Even with non-swim Medaparts, you can cross deep waters. If you use Wave Medaparts on a raft, you can move it with that power.
medabots_server:message.help.round_stone: Round stones can be moved with hammer and wave Medaparts. However, once they starts rolling, they don't stop. If a round stone runs into a wall, it stops. Make sure to only move them when you need to. You don't want to be hit by a round stone, don't get crushed by it.
medabots_server:message.help.rubberobo: If you attack a Rubberobo with Medaparts, he'll be surprised and run away. You don't need to defeat them, just drive them away. Watch their reaction when attacking them. No matter how much you attack them with Medaparts, they are fine. If they get in a trap, they'll be knocked down too. Don't let them near strong traps. Chase out all the Rubberobos from the area, and enter the goal!
medabots_server:message.help.spring_wall: A spring wall can be activated by many floor switches. I'll launch back anything in front of it. If a round stone runs into the spring wall, it'll bounce it off.
medabots_server:message.help.starting_ar: Where you are standing now, is called the starting area. Use the devices, and get all the way to the goal. Just head for the goal.
medabots_server:message.help.stone: This stone is low. If you have fly or float Medaparts you can soar over it without a problem. Other-legged Medabots may get slightly annoyed by the stones.
medabots_server:message.help.thin_ice: If you are equipped with freeze Medaparts, you can create thin ice on the water. If too much time passes, the thin ice will melt. If you just sit there you'll fall in the water!
medabots_server:message.help.wall: No matter how much you attack, that wall cannot be broken. Just go around it.
medabots_server:message.help.whirlpool: If you equip swim Medaparts, you can dive into the watery depths. But if you get caught in a Whirlpool you'll drown. So never go near them.

medabots_server:message.random.1: Have a suggestion for a custom Medabot? Think about it very well, before you suggest it.
medabots_server:message.random.10: You can grab edges as long as there's room to put your hands. All you have to do is face the edge in midair. By sneaking, you can let go of an edge or prevent yourself from grabbing an edge.
medabots_server:message.random.11: Fly and float Medaparts allow you to stay above surfaces. They will also make you float up when above lava and or fire
medabots_server:message.random.12: You can jump on enemies to get a lift, so don’t be afraid to jump your way to victory!
medabots_server:message.random.13: When you are in a fly course, try setting your mouse's sensitivity higher. Having a higher sensitivity means it takes less effort required to make a turn due to less mouse movement which also means being able to turn around much faster.
medabots_server:message.random.14: The rings in fly courses have lights that indicate in what direction the next ring is. So pay attention to what side(s) the lights are on.
medabots_server:message.random.2: Listen to the mods. When they say you shouldn’t go into a stage, don't do it!
medabots_server:message.random.3: Want to improve one of the stages? Ask a Medabot. Put down why you want to help and perhaps the mods will allow you to help improve a stage.
medabots_server:message.random.4: Is your favorite Medabot not in the sever? Don't worry, the server will eventually have all bots. You can suggest it so it's implemented faster.
medabots_server:message.random.5: Got auto reported with an error? Contact the mods and file it as a bug.
medabots_server:message.random.6: Found an exploit? Go and report it to the private section in the bug tracker please.
medabots_server:message.random.7: All stage bosses give rewards under certain conditions, so do your best to meet all conditions.
medabots_server:message.random.8: Is a move mis-implemented? File it as a suggestion and explain how you think it should be implemented.
medabots_server:message.random.9: Have a problem with loading chunks or lag after teleportation? Press F3+A and this will reload all chunks and unload the non visible ones on your client, causing a temporary fps increase.
