medabots_server:message.special_intro.sl: I will... make your clothes dirty!
medabots_server:message.special_killer.d: Hmm, you can't be off guard.
medabots_server:message.sphere_doomers.i: Can you beat all four of us?
medabots_server:message.stage.already_pl: Just a moment, somebody is busy.
medabots_server:message.stage.available_: No player was found in the stage; the stage has been cleaned up and can now be played again.
medabots_server:message.stage.cant_leave: You can't just leave the stage if you are waiting for remaining players.
medabots_server:message.stage.cant_retry: This stage version could only be attempted once, select another stage version to enter.
medabots_server:message.stage.clear_befo: You need to have cleared this stage version before you can fight players in it; to play it, turn "versus computer enemies" on.
medabots_server:message.stage.descriptio: An everlasting combat stage located in a different dimension. Careful, Magolor can be just around the corner!
A desert stage with 9 areas. It's a simple design, but that doesn't take out the challenge.
An outer-worldly arena stage. Prepare for any mystery fighters you might face. Also known as Master Hand's Residence.
An outer-worldly arena stage. A familiar enemy resides here, but something's different.
An outer-worldly arena stage. Now with no limited side movement.
An outer-worldly arena stage. Show your true strength that you have hidden away.
Grassland stage for practice. Big and smooth so all Medabots can move well.
Grassland stage for preliminary matches. There is a river in the middle, but it's shallow water for all Medabots.
Modified Grassland stage. You've seen it before, but somehow it doesn't work the same way...
New Grassland stage. Combined with Rock stage, you can play more freely.
Grassland stage for stage builder. The theme is the snake charmer, can you see...?
Hard Fly Course for official races. Fly while swimming through the harbor's surroundings, not taking detours is almost out of the question.
Iceberg stage for practice. Float Medaparts can handle slippery and narrow fields.
Iceberg stage for preliminary matches. The land is irregular and visibility is low, so be careful with traps.
Modified Iceberg stage. You can't tell if the ground used to be floor or ice.
New Iceberg stage. Combined with Seashore stage, you can play more freely.
Icefield stage for stage builder. Deep water is surrounded with melting ice.
Arena stage with Seashore theme.
Jungle stage for practice. A combination of wide and narrow land. 2-Legged Medaparts are useful.
Jungle stage for preliminary matches. There are many holes, 2-Legged Medaparts can jump over them.
Modified Jungle stage. It has been eroded, it is not as uneven as before.
New Jungle stage. Combined with Rock stage, you can play more freely.
Jungle stage for stage builder. Unlike other Jungle stages is the main, the animal trail.
Laboratory stage for practice. Difficulty varies depending on traps, so it could be hard.
Laboratory stage for preliminary matches. There are complex traps in each room.
Modified Laboratory stage. It's smaller than before, it seems very tricky.
New Laboratory stage. Combined with Ruins-Out stage, you can play more freely.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. There are few hazards but many walls that can be climbed or flown over.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. An open stage with several walls one can hide behind, albeit briefly.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. A flat, semi-open surface with several structures that can be flown over.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. There are several buildings one can hide both inside of and on top of.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. A fully indoors stage mostly consisting of corridors. No hazards.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. The markings on the walls periodically fire poison.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. There is a large, central room with a slowing floor that’s surrounded by a long, winding corridor.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. A stage with several water channels running through it that can be swum in.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. There is a large mass of water with bridges periodically appearing and disappearing.
Arena stage for 2 or more players. The floor randomly catches on fire temporarily. There are also several holes filled with lava.
Medium Fly Course for preliminary races. A bit more thrilling flight among the moderators' statues, careful with going straight down.
Paradise stage for official matches. It has all the features of different stages.
Paradise stage for official matches. A monkey mountain, can you see it...?
Park stage for official matches. It is surrounded with the ice course.
Park stage for official matches. It is surrounded with rivers with many traps.
Arena stage with Amusement Park theme.
Isle Delfino's port city is home to boats of all sizes and a thriving tourist trade. Swim Medaparts go very well in this port.
Rock stage for practice. The land is irregular, so Multi-Legged Medaparts are useful.
Rock stage for preliminary matches. Deep waters are in between lands. Traps can be found near bridges.
Rock stage for stage builder. Be careful with traps on narrow and complex fields.
Rock stage for stage builder. Modified version of Rock E stage, it's compacter.
Arena stage with Ruins theme.
Ruins-In stage for practice. Tank Medaparts can handle the topography while defending.
Ruins-In stage for preliminary matches. Which would you choose, left or right?
New Ruins-In stage. Combined with Ruins-Out stage, you can play more freely.
Ruins-In stage for stage builder. There are many rooms to place traps.
Ruins-Out stage for practice. Wheel Medaparts are good at big fields.
Ruins-Out stage for preliminary matches. Big fields with few obstacles can be handled well by Wheel Medaparts.
Modified Ruins-Out stage. It used to be a beautiful garden, it has changed dramatically.
Ruins-Out stage for stage builder. The field can be sectioned easily with doors.
Seashore stage for practice. Swim Medaparts are good in shallow and deep waters.
Seashore stage for preliminary matches. The port in the bay can be handled by Swim Medaparts.
Modified Seashore stage. It has changed dramatically, be careful with deep waters.
Seashore stage for stage builder. Swim Medaparts can handle shallow and deep waters all over the stage.
Snowfield stage for practice. There are hardly any obstacles, so Fly Medaparts are useful.
Snowfield stage for preliminary matches. Be careful with deep waters while running on a wide ice field.
New Snowfield stage. Combined with Seashore stage, you can play more freely.
Snowfield stage for stage builder. The middle part is covered with ice, and few parts are sectioned.
A dark realm filled with silence. Watch your step, it is not easy to see where the ground ends.
Arena stage with Forest theme.

medabots_server:move.anti_fly.descriptio: Destroys enemies with Fly parts with the use of a bullet.
medabots_server:move.anti_tank.descripti: Destroys enemies with Tank parts with the use of a trap.
medabots_server:move.beam.description: Pierces through enemies, but doesn't get reflected.
medabots_server:move.bug.description: Make others lose control over where they look.
medabots_server:move.chameleon_medal.des: A damaging balloon that moves slowly.
medabots_server:move.destroy.description: Deals a lot of damage in a small radius.
medabots_server:move.devil_medal.descrip: Deals a lot of damage to enemies in front of the user.
medabots_server:move.falling.description: Make others fall on the head and get damage.
medabots_server:move.float.description: Float over holes, water and obstacles.
medabots_server:move.fly.description: Fly over holes, water and obstacles.
medabots_server:move.freeze.description: Freeze other Medabots for a short time.
medabots_server:move.gatling.description: Shoot a few times in a row and damage others.
medabots_server:move.ghost_medal.descrip: Prevents enemies from moving around for a while.
medabots_server:move.hammer.description: Damage others with a hammer attack.
medabots_server:move.hide.description: Become invisible and sneak up to others.
medabots_server:move.ineffective.descrip: Temporarily blocks a random Medapart of the opponent.
medabots_server:move.kabuto_medal.descri: Inflict huge damage using a shooting attack.
medabots_server:move.knight_medal.descri: Gives the defense effect for a long time.
medabots_server:move.kuwagata_medal.desc: Inflict a big amount of damage to all Medaparts.
medabots_server:move.laser.description: Deals a lot of damage to everything but loads slow.
medabots_server:move.medaforce_control.d: Toggles the medaforce of your opponent.
medabots_server:move.melee_trap.descript: Others who use a melee attack in a set trap get damage.
medabots_server:move.melt.description: Burn others to ashes by lighting them on fire.
medabots_server:move.missile.description: Deals a lot of damage when shot.
medabots_server:move.monkey_medal.descri: Repairs all broken Medaparts and head uses.
medabots_server:move.multi_legged.descri: Zigzag your way through attacks and obstacles.
medabots_server:move.napalm.description: Deals damage to everything in range of the explosion.
medabots_server:move.paralyze.descriptio: Paralyzes other Medabots and makes them forget their move.
medabots_server:move.perfect_guard.descr: Get no damage, but be slow for a while.
medabots_server:move.question_medal.desc: Confuses and bugs everybody in range.
medabots_server:move.rifle.description: Gives damage and knockback to the other when shot.
medabots_server:move.sacrifice.descripti: Deals huge damage but can only be used once.
medabots_server:move.shooting_trap.descr: Others who use a shooting attack in a set trap get damage.
medabots_server:move.spider_medal.descri: Sets a trap for both melee and shooting Medaparts.
medabots_server:move.status_clear.descri: Gets rid of all status effects.
medabots_server:move.swim.description: Allows you to swim without getting damage.
medabots_server:move.sword.description: Damage others with a sword attack.
medabots_server:move.transform.descripti: Transforms the Medapart to a random other Medapart for a while
medabots_server:move.unicorn_medal.descr: Steals armor values from the opponent.
medabots_server:move.wave.description: Blows others, Rafts and Balloon Bombs away.
medabots_server:move.wheel.description: Allows you to go really fast.
